00111 NPCQuoteInfo * LoadQuoteFile( UINT8 ubNPC )
00112 {
00113       CHAR8                               zFileName[255];
00114       HWFILE                              hFile;
00115       NPCQuoteInfo      * pFileData;
00116       UINT32                              uiBytesRead;
00117       UINT32                              uiFileSize;
00118 
00119       if ( ubNPC == PETER || ubNPC == ALBERTO || ubNPC == CARLO )
00120       {
00121             // use a copy of Herve's data file instead!
00122             sprintf( zFileName, "NPCData\\%03d.npc", HERVE );
00123       }
00124       else if ( ubNPC < FIRST_RPC || ubNPC >= GASTON || (ubNPC < FIRST_NPC && gMercProfiles[ ubNPC ].ubMiscFlags & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_RECRUITED ) )
00125       {
00126             sprintf( zFileName, "NPCData\\000.npc", ubNPC );
00127       }
00128       else
00129       {
00130             sprintf( zFileName, "NPCData\\%03d.npc", ubNPC );
00131       }
00132 
00133       // ATE: Put some stuff i here to use a different NPC file if we are in a meanwhile.....
00134       if ( AreInMeanwhile( ) )
00135       {
00136             // If we are the queen....
00137             if ( ubNPC == QUEEN )
00138             {
00139                   sprintf( zFileName, "NPCData\\%03d.npc", gubAlternateNPCFileNumsForQueenMeanwhiles[ GetMeanwhileID( ) ] );              
00140             }
00141 
00142             // If we are elliot....
00143             if ( ubNPC == ELLIOT )
00144             {
00145                   sprintf( zFileName, "NPCData\\%03d.npc", gubAlternateNPCFileNumsForElliotMeanwhiles[ GetMeanwhileID( ) ] );             
00146             }
00147 
00148       }
00149 
00150       CHECKN( FileExists( zFileName ) );
00151 
00152       hFile = FileOpen( zFileName, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
00153       CHECKN( hFile );
00154 
00155       uiFileSize = sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo ) * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS;
00156       pFileData = (NPCQuoteInfo *)MemAlloc( uiFileSize );
00157       if (pFileData)
00158       {
00159             if (!FileRead( hFile, pFileData, uiFileSize, &uiBytesRead ) || uiBytesRead != uiFileSize )
00160             {
00161                   MemFree( pFileData );
00162                   pFileData = NULL;
00163             }
00164       }
00165       
00166       FileClose( hFile );
00167 
00168       return( pFileData );
00169 }

00171 void RevertToOriginalQuoteFile( UINT8 ubNPC ) 
00172 {
00173       if ( gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNPC ] && gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC] )
00174       {
00175             MemFree( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC] );
00176             gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC] = gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC];
00177             gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC] = NULL;
00178       }
00179 }
00180 
00181 void BackupOriginalQuoteFile( UINT8 ubNPC )
00182 {
00183       gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNPC ] = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNPC ];
00184       gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC] = NULL;
00185 }

00187 BOOLEAN EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( UINT8 ubNPC )
00188 {
00189       BOOLEAN                 fLoadFile = FALSE;
00190 
00191       if ( ubNPC == ROBOT )
00192       {
00193             return( FALSE );
00194       }
00195 
00196       if (gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC] == NULL)
00197       {
00198             fLoadFile = TRUE;
00199       }
00200 
00201       if ( ubNPC >= FIRST_RPC && ubNPC < FIRST_NPC )
00202       {
00203             if (gMercProfiles[ ubNPC ].ubMiscFlags & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_RECRUITED) 
00204             {
00205                   // recruited
00206                   if ( gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNPC ] == NULL )
00207                   {
00208                         // no backup stored of current script, so need to backup
00209                         fLoadFile = TRUE;
00210                         // set pointer to back up script!
00211                         BackupOriginalQuoteFile( ubNPC );
00212                   }
00213                   // else have backup, are recruited, nothing special
00214             }
00215             else
00216             {
00217                   // not recruited
00218                   if ( gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNPC ] != NULL )
00219                   {
00220                         // backup stored, restore backup
00221                         RevertToOriginalQuoteFile( ubNPC );
00222                   }
00223                   // else are no backup, nothing special
00224             }
00225       }
00226 
00227       if ( fLoadFile )
00228       {
00229             gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC] = LoadQuoteFile( ubNPC );
00230             if (gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC] == NULL)
00231             {
00232 #ifdef CRIPPLED_VERSION
00233                   // make sure we're not trying to load NOPROFILE for some stupid reason
00234                   if ( ubNPC != NO_PROFILE )
00235                   {
00236                         SOLDIERTYPE * pNull = NULL;
00237                         pNull->bLife = 0; // crash!
00238                   }
00239 #else
00240 
00241             #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00242                   if (!gfTriedToLoadQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC]) // don't report the error a second time
00243                   {
00244 
00245                         ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_RED, MSG_DEBUG, L"ERROR: NPC.C - NPC needs NPC file: %d.", ubNPC );
00246                         gfTriedToLoadQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC] = TRUE;
00247                   }
00248             #endif
00249 #endif
00250                   // error message at this point!
00251                   return( FALSE );
00252             }
00253 #ifdef CRIPPLED_VERSION
00254       // check a random record to make sure the bytes are set right in the header
00255       if ( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC][ 0 ].ubIdentifier[0] != '9')
00256       {
00257             if ( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC][ 0 ].ubIdentifier[2] != '5')
00258             {
00259                   // crash!
00260                   SOLDIERTYPE * pNull = NULL;
00261                   pNull->bLife = 0;
00262             }
00263       }
00264 
00265 
00266 #endif
00267       }
00268 
00269       return( TRUE );
00270 }
00271 
00272 BOOLEAN ReloadQuoteFile( UINT8 ubNPC )
00273 {
00274       if (gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC] != NULL)
00275       {
00276             MemFree( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC] );
00277             gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC] = NULL;
00278       }
00279       // zap backup if any
00280       if ( gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNPC ] != NULL )
00281       {
00282             MemFree( gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNPC ] );
00283             gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNPC ] = NULL;
00284       }
00285       return( EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubNPC ) );
00286 }
00287 
00288 BOOLEAN ReloadQuoteFileIfLoaded( UINT8 ubNPC )
00289 {
00290       if (gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC] != NULL)
00291       {
00292             MemFree( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC] );
00293             gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC] = NULL;
00294             return( EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubNPC ) );
00295       }
00296       else
00297       {
00298             return( TRUE );
00299       }
00300 }
00301 
00302 BOOLEAN RefreshNPCScriptRecord( UINT8 ubNPC, UINT8 ubRecord )
00303 {
00304       UINT8                                     ubLoop;
00305       NPCQuoteInfo *          pNewArray;
00306 
00307       if ( ubNPC == NO_PROFILE )
00308       {
00309             // we have some work to do...
00310             // loop through all PCs, and refresh their copy of this record
00311             for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < FIRST_RPC; ubLoop++ ) // need more finesse here
00312             {
00313                   RefreshNPCScriptRecord( ubLoop, ubRecord );
00314             }
00315             for ( ubLoop = GASTON; ubLoop < NUM_PROFILES; ubLoop++ ) // need more finesse here
00316             {
00317                   RefreshNPCScriptRecord( ubLoop, ubRecord );
00318             }
00319             for ( ubLoop = FIRST_RPC; ubLoop < FIRST_NPC; ubLoop++ )
00320             {
00321                   if ( gMercProfiles[ ubNPC ].ubMiscFlags & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_RECRUITED && gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNPC ] != NULL )
00322                   {
00323                         RefreshNPCScriptRecord( ubLoop, ubRecord );
00324                   }
00325             }
00326             return( TRUE );
00327       }
00328 
00329       if ( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNPC ] )
00330       {
00331             if ( CHECK_FLAG( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNPC ][ ubRecord ].fFlags, QUOTE_FLAG_SAID ) )
00332             {
00333                   // already used so we don't have to refresh!
00334                   return( TRUE );
00335             }
00336 
00337             pNewArray = LoadQuoteFile( ubNPC );
00338             if ( pNewArray )
00339             {
00340                   memcpy( &(gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNPC ][ ubRecord ]), &(pNewArray[ ubRecord ]), sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo ) );
00341                   MemFree( pNewArray );
00342             }
00343       }
00344       return( TRUE );
00345 }

00351 NPCQuoteInfo * LoadCivQuoteFile( UINT8 ubIndex )
00352 {
00353       CHAR8                               zFileName[255];
00354       HWFILE                              hFile;
00355       NPCQuoteInfo      * pFileData;
00356       UINT32                              uiBytesRead;
00357       UINT32                              uiFileSize;
00358 
00359   if ( ubIndex == MINERS_CIV_QUOTE_INDEX )
00360   {
00361         sprintf( zFileName, "NPCData\\miners.npc" );
00362   }
00363   else
00364   {
00365         sprintf( zFileName, "NPCData\\%c%d.npc", 'A' + ( gsCivQuoteSector[ ubIndex ][ 1 ] - 1 ), gsCivQuoteSector[ ubIndex ][ 0 ] );
00366   }
00367 
00368       CHECKN( FileExists( zFileName ) );
00369 
00370       hFile = FileOpen( zFileName, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
00371       CHECKN( hFile );
00372 
00373       uiFileSize = sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo ) * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS;
00374       pFileData = (NPCQuoteInfo *)MemAlloc( uiFileSize );
00375       if (pFileData)
00376       {
00377             if (!FileRead( hFile, pFileData, uiFileSize, &uiBytesRead ) || uiBytesRead != uiFileSize )
00378             {
00379                   MemFree( pFileData );
00380                   pFileData = NULL;
00381             }
00382       }
00383       
00384       FileClose( hFile );
00385 
00386       return( pFileData );
00387 }

00390 BOOLEAN EnsureCivQuoteFileLoaded( UINT8 ubIndex )
00391 {
00392       BOOLEAN                 fLoadFile = FALSE;
00393 
00394       if (gpCivQuoteInfoArray[ubIndex] == NULL)
00395       {
00396             fLoadFile = TRUE;
00397       }
00398 
00399       if ( fLoadFile )
00400       {
00401             gpCivQuoteInfoArray[ubIndex] = LoadCivQuoteFile( ubIndex );
00402             if (gpCivQuoteInfoArray[ubIndex] == NULL)
00403             {
00404                   return( FALSE );
00405             }
00406       }
00407 
00408       return( TRUE );
00409 }

00435 void ShutdownNPCQuotes( void )
00436 {
00437       UINT8       ubLoop;
00438 
00439       for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < NUM_PROFILES; ubLoop++ )
00440       {
00441             if ( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubLoop ] )
00442             {
00443                   MemFree( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubLoop ] );
00444                   gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubLoop ] = NULL;
00445             }
00446 
00447             if ( gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubLoop ] != NULL )
00448             {
00449                   MemFree( gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubLoop ] );
00450                   gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubLoop ] = NULL;
00451             }
00452       
00453       }
00454 
00455 
00456       for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < NUM_CIVQUOTE_SECTORS; ubLoop++ )
00457       {
00458             if ( gpCivQuoteInfoArray[ ubLoop ] )
00459             {
00460                   MemFree( gpCivQuoteInfoArray[ ubLoop ] );
00461                   gpCivQuoteInfoArray[ ubLoop ] = NULL;
00462             }
00463       }
00464 }

00470 BOOLEAN ReloadAllQuoteFiles( void )
00471 {
00472       UINT8       ubProfile, ubLoop;
00473 
00474       for ( ubProfile = FIRST_RPC; ubProfile < GASTON; ubProfile++ )
00475       {
00476             // zap backup if any
00477             if ( gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubProfile ] != NULL )
00478             {
00479                   MemFree( gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubProfile ] );
00480                   gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubProfile ] = NULL;
00481             }
00482             ReloadQuoteFileIfLoaded( ubProfile );
00483       }
00484       // reload all civ quote files
00485       for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < NUM_CIVQUOTE_SECTORS; ubLoop++ )
00486       {
00487             ReloadCivQuoteFileIfLoaded( ubLoop );
00488       }
00489 
00490 
00491       return( TRUE );
00492 }

00499 void SetQuoteRecordAsUsed( UINT8 ubNPC, UINT8 ubRecord )

00506 
00507 INT32 CalcThreateningEffectiveness( UINT8 ubMerc )
00508 {
00509       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
00510       INT32                         iStrength, iDeadliness;
00511 
00512       // effective threat is 1/3 strength, 1/3 weapon deadliness, 1/3 leadership
00513 
00514       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubMerc, TRUE );
00515 
00516       if ( !pSoldier )
00517       {
00518             return( 0 );
00519       }
00520 
00521       iStrength = EffectiveStrength( pSoldier );
00522 
00523       if ( Item[ pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem ].usItemClass & IC_WEAPON )
00524       {
00525             iDeadliness = Weapon[ pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem ].ubDeadliness;
00526       }
00527       else
00528       {
00529             iDeadliness = 0;
00530       }
00531 
00532       if ( iDeadliness == 0 )
00533       {
00534             // penalize!
00535             iDeadliness = -30;
00536       }
00537 
00538       return( (EffectiveLeadership( pSoldier ) + iStrength + iDeadliness) / 3 ); //Trail minor bug fix.
00539 }
00540 
00541 UINT8 CalcDesireToTalk( UINT8 ubNPC, UINT8 ubMerc, INT8 bApproach )
00542 {
00543       INT32 iWillingness;
00544       INT32 iPersonalVal, iTownVal, iApproachVal;
00545       INT32 iEffectiveLeadership;
00546       MERCPROFILESTRUCT * pNPCProfile;
00547       MERCPROFILESTRUCT * pMercProfile;
00548 
00549       pNPCProfile = &(gMercProfiles[ubNPC]);
00550       pMercProfile = &(gMercProfiles[ubMerc]);
00551 
00552       iPersonalVal = 50 + pNPCProfile->bMercOpinion[ubMerc]; /* + pNPCProfile->bMercTownReputation[ pNPCProfile->bTown ] */;
00553 
00554       // ARM: NOTE - for towns which don't use loyalty (San Mona, Estoni, Tixa, Orta )
00555       // loyalty will always remain 0 (this was OKed by Ian)
00556       iTownVal = gTownLoyalty[ pNPCProfile->bTown ].ubRating;
00557       iTownVal = iTownVal * pNPCProfile->bTownAttachment / 100;
00558 
00559       if (bApproach == NPC_INITIATING_CONV || bApproach == APPROACH_GIVINGITEM )
00560       {
00561             iApproachVal = 100;
00562       }
00563       else if ( bApproach == APPROACH_THREATEN )
00564       {
00565             iEffectiveLeadership = CalcThreateningEffectiveness( ubMerc ) * pMercProfile->usApproachFactor[bApproach - 1] / 100;
00566             iApproachVal = pNPCProfile->ubApproachVal[bApproach - 1] * iEffectiveLeadership / 50;
00567       }
00568       else
00569       {
00570             iEffectiveLeadership = ((INT32) pMercProfile->bLeadership) * pMercProfile->usApproachFactor[bApproach - 1] / 100;
00571             iApproachVal = pNPCProfile->ubApproachVal[bApproach - 1] * iEffectiveLeadership / 50;     
00572       }
00573       // NB if town attachment is less than 100% then we should make personal value proportionately more important!
00574       if ( pNPCProfile->bTownAttachment < 100 )
00575       {
00576             iPersonalVal = iPersonalVal * (100 + (100 - pNPCProfile->bTownAttachment) ) / 100;
00577       }
00578       iWillingness = (iPersonalVal / 2 + iTownVal / 2) * iApproachVal   / 100 - gubTeamPenalty;
00579 
00580       if (bApproach == NPC_INITIATING_CONV)
00581       {
00582             iWillingness -= INITIATING_FACTOR;
00583       }
00584 
00585       if (iWillingness < 0)
00586       {
00587             iWillingness = 0;
00588       }
00589 
00590       return( (UINT8) iWillingness );
00591 }
00592 
00593 void ApproachedForFirstTime( MERCPROFILESTRUCT * pNPCProfile, INT8 bApproach )
00594 {
00595       UINT8       ubLoop; 
00596       UINT32      uiTemp;
00597 
00598       pNPCProfile->bApproached |= gbFirstApproachFlags[bApproach - 1];
00599       for (ubLoop = 1; ubLoop <= NUM_REAL_APPROACHES; ubLoop++)
00600       {
00601             uiTemp = (UINT32) pNPCProfile->ubApproachVal[ubLoop - 1] * (UINT32) pNPCProfile->ubApproachMod[bApproach - 1][ubLoop - 1] / 100;
00602             if (uiTemp > 255)
00603             {
00604                   uiTemp = 255;
00605             }
00606             pNPCProfile->ubApproachVal[ubLoop-1] = (UINT8) uiTemp;
00607       }
00608 }
00609 
00610 UINT8 NPCConsiderTalking( UINT8 ubNPC, UINT8 ubMerc, INT8 bApproach, UINT8 ubRecord, NPCQuoteInfo * pNPCQuoteInfoArray, NPCQuoteInfo ** ppResultQuoteInfo, UINT8 *pubQuoteNum )
00611 {
00612       // This function returns the opinion level required of the "most difficult" quote 
00613       // that the NPC is willing to say to the merc.  It can also provide the quote #.
00614       MERCPROFILESTRUCT *           pNPCProfile=NULL;
00615       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pNPCQuoteInfo=NULL;
00616       UINT8                                                 ubTalkDesire, ubLoop, ubQuote, ubHighestOpinionRequired = 0;
00617       BOOLEAN                                               fQuoteFound = FALSE;
00618       UINT32                                                uiDay;
00619       UINT8                                                 ubFirstQuoteRecord, ubLastQuoteRecord;
00620       SOLDIERTYPE                               *pSoldier=NULL;
00621 
00622       ubTalkDesire = ubQuote = 0;
00623 
00624       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubNPC, FALSE );
00625       if (pSoldier == NULL)
00626       {
00627             return( 0 );
00628       }
00629 
00630       if (ppResultQuoteInfo)
00631       {
00632             (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = NULL;
00633       }
00634 
00635       if ( pubQuoteNum )
00636       {
00637             (*pubQuoteNum) = 0;
00638       }
00639 
00640       if (bApproach <= NUM_REAL_APPROACHES)
00641       {
00642             pNPCProfile = &(gMercProfiles[ubNPC]);
00643             // What's our willingness to divulge?
00644             ubTalkDesire = CalcDesireToTalk( ubNPC, ubMerc, bApproach );
00645             if ( bApproach < NUM_REAL_APPROACHES && !(pNPCProfile->bApproached & gbFirstApproachFlags[bApproach - 1]) )
00646             {
00647                   ApproachedForFirstTime( pNPCProfile, bApproach );
00648             }
00649       }
00650       else if ( ubNPC == PABLO && bApproach == APPROACH_SECTOR_NOT_SAFE ) // for Pablo, consider as threaten
00651       {
00652             pNPCProfile = &(gMercProfiles[ubNPC]);
00653             // What's our willingness to divulge?
00654             ubTalkDesire = CalcDesireToTalk( ubNPC, ubMerc, APPROACH_THREATEN );
00655             if ( pNPCProfile->bApproached & gbFirstApproachFlags[APPROACH_THREATEN - 1] )
00656             {
00657                   ApproachedForFirstTime( pNPCProfile, APPROACH_THREATEN );
00658             }
00659       }
00660 
00661       switch( bApproach )
00662       {
00663       /*
00664             case APPROACH_RECRUIT:
00665                   ubFirstQuoteRecord = 0;
00666                   ubLastQuoteRecord = 0;
00667                   break;
00668                   */
00669             case TRIGGER_NPC:
00670                   ubFirstQuoteRecord = ubRecord;
00671                   ubLastQuoteRecord = ubRecord;
00672                   break;
00673             default:
00674                   ubFirstQuoteRecord = 0;
00675                   ubLastQuoteRecord = NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS - 1;
00676                   break;
00677       }
00678 
00679       uiDay = GetWorldDay();
00680 
00681       for (ubLoop = ubFirstQuoteRecord; ubLoop <= ubLastQuoteRecord; ubLoop++)
00682       {
00683             pNPCQuoteInfo = &(pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubLoop ]);
00684 
00685             // Check if we have the item / are in right spot
00686             if ( pNPCQuoteInfo->sRequiredItem > 0 )
00687             {
00688                   if ( !ObjectExistsInSoldierProfile( ubNPC, pNPCQuoteInfo->sRequiredItem )  )
00689                   {
00690                         continue;
00691                   }
00692             }
00693             else if ( pNPCQuoteInfo->sRequiredGridno < 0 )
00694             {
00695                   if ( pSoldier->sGridNo != -(pNPCQuoteInfo->sRequiredGridno) )
00696                   {
00697                         continue;
00698                   }
00699             }
00700 
00701             if ( NPCConsiderQuote( ubNPC, ubMerc, bApproach, ubLoop, ubTalkDesire, pNPCQuoteInfoArray ) )
00702             {
00703                   if (bApproach == NPC_INITIATING_CONV)
00704                   {
00705                         // want to find the quote with the highest required opinion rating that we're willing
00706                         // to say
00707                         if ( pNPCQuoteInfo->ubOpinionRequired > ubHighestOpinionRequired )
00708                         {
00709                               fQuoteFound = TRUE;
00710                               ubHighestOpinionRequired = pNPCQuoteInfo->ubOpinionRequired;
00711                               ubQuote = pNPCQuoteInfo->ubQuoteNum;
00712                         }
00713                   }
00714                   else
00715                   {
00716                         // we do have a quote to say, and we want to say this one right away!
00717                         if (ppResultQuoteInfo)
00718                         {
00719                               (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = pNPCQuoteInfo;
00720                         }
00721                         if ( pubQuoteNum )
00722                         {
00723                               (*pubQuoteNum) = ubLoop;
00724                         }
00725 
00726                         return( pNPCQuoteInfo->ubOpinionRequired );
00727                   }
00728             }
00729 
00730       }
00731 
00732       // Whew, checked them all.  If we found a quote, return the appropriate values.
00733       if (fQuoteFound)
00734       {
00735             if (ppResultQuoteInfo)
00736             {
00737                   (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = pNPCQuoteInfo;
00738             }
00739             if ( pubQuoteNum )
00740             {
00741                   (*pubQuoteNum) = ubQuote;
00742             }
00743 
00744             return( ubHighestOpinionRequired );
00745       }
00746       else
00747       {
00748             if (ppResultQuoteInfo)
00749             {                 
00750                   (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = NULL;
00751             }
00752             if ( pubQuoteNum )
00753             {
00754                   (*pubQuoteNum) = 0;
00755             }
00756             return( 0 );
00757       }
00758 }
00759 
00760 UINT8 NPCConsiderReceivingItemFromMerc( UINT8 ubNPC, UINT8 ubMerc, OBJECTTYPE * pObj, NPCQuoteInfo * pNPCQuoteInfoArray, NPCQuoteInfo ** ppResultQuoteInfo, UINT8 *pubQuoteNum )
00761 {
00762       // This function returns the opinion level required of the "most difficult" quote 
00763       // that the NPC is willing to say to the merc.  It can also provide the quote #.
00764       MERCPROFILESTRUCT *           pNPCProfile;
00765       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pNPCQuoteInfo;
00766       UINT8                                                 ubTalkDesire, ubLoop, ubHighestOpinionRequired = 0;
00767       BOOLEAN                                               fQuoteFound = FALSE;
00768       UINT8                                                 ubFirstQuoteRecord, ubLastQuoteRecord;
00769       UINT16                                                usItemToConsider;
00770 
00771       (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = NULL;
00772       (*pubQuoteNum)                 = 0;
00773 
00774       if ( CheckFact( FACT_NPC_IS_ENEMY, ubNPC ) && ubNPC != JOE )
00775       {
00776             // don't accept any items when we are the player's enemy
00777             return( 0 );
00778       }
00779 
00780       pNPCProfile = &(gMercProfiles[ubNPC]);
00781 
00782       // How much do we want to talk with this merc?
00783 
00784       ubTalkDesire = CalcDesireToTalk( ubNPC, ubMerc, APPROACH_GIVINGITEM );
00785 
00786       ubFirstQuoteRecord = 0;
00787       ubLastQuoteRecord = NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS - 1;
00788 
00789       usItemToConsider = pObj->usItem;
00790       if ( Item[ usItemToConsider ].usItemClass == IC_GUN && !Item[usItemToConsider].rocketlauncher  )
00791       {
00792             UINT8 ubWeaponClass;
00793 
00794             ubWeaponClass = Weapon[ usItemToConsider ].ubWeaponClass;
00795             if ( ubWeaponClass == RIFLECLASS || ubWeaponClass == MGCLASS )
00796             {
00797                   usItemToConsider = ANY_RIFLE; // treat all rifles the same
00798             }
00799       }
00800       switch( usItemToConsider )
00801       {
00802             case HEAD_2:
00803             case HEAD_3:
00804             //case HEAD_4: // NOT Slay's head; it's different
00805             case HEAD_5:
00806             case HEAD_6:
00807             case HEAD_7:
00808                   // all treated the same in the NPC code
00809                   usItemToConsider = HEAD_2;
00810                   break;
00811             case MONEY:
00812             case SILVER:
00813             case GOLD:
00814                   if (pObj->uiMoneyAmount < LARGE_AMOUNT_MONEY)
00815                   {
00816                         SetFactTrue( FACT_SMALL_AMOUNT_OF_MONEY );
00817                   }
00818                   else
00819                   {
00820                         SetFactTrue( FACT_LARGE_AMOUNT_OF_MONEY );
00821                   }
00822                   usItemToConsider = MONEY;
00823                   break;
00824             case WINE:
00825             case BEER:
00826                   usItemToConsider = ALCOHOL;
00827                   break;      
00828             default:
00829                   break;
00830       }
00831 
00832       if (pObj->bStatus[0] < 50)
00833       {
00834             SetFactTrue( FACT_ITEM_POOR_CONDITION );
00835       }
00836       else
00837       {
00838             SetFactFalse( FACT_ITEM_POOR_CONDITION );
00839       }
00840 
00841       for (ubLoop = ubFirstQuoteRecord; ubLoop <= ubLastQuoteRecord; ubLoop++)
00842       {
00843             pNPCQuoteInfo = &(pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubLoop ]);
00844 
00845             // First see if we want that item....
00846             if ( pNPCQuoteInfo->sRequiredItem > 0 && ( pNPCQuoteInfo->sRequiredItem == usItemToConsider || pNPCQuoteInfo->sRequiredItem == ACCEPT_ANY_ITEM ) )
00847             {
00848                   // Now see if everyhting else is OK
00849                   if ( NPCConsiderQuote( ubNPC, ubMerc, APPROACH_GIVINGITEM, ubLoop, ubTalkDesire, pNPCQuoteInfoArray ) )
00850                   {
00851                         switch( ubNPC )
00852                         {
00853                               case DARREN:
00854                                     if (usItemToConsider == MONEY && pNPCQuoteInfo->sActionData == NPC_ACTION_DARREN_GIVEN_CASH)
00855                                     {
00856                                           if (pObj->uiMoneyAmount < 1000)
00857                                           {
00858                                                 // refuse, bet too low - record 15
00859                                                 (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[15];
00860                                                 (*pubQuoteNum)       = 15;
00861                                                 return( (*ppResultQuoteInfo)->ubOpinionRequired );
00862                                           }
00863                                           else if (pObj->uiMoneyAmount > 5000)
00864                                           {
00865                                                 // refuse, bet too high - record 16
00866                                                 (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[16];
00867                                                 (*pubQuoteNum)       = 16;
00868                                                 return( (*ppResultQuoteInfo)->ubOpinionRequired );
00869                                           }
00870                                           else
00871                                           {
00872                                                 // accept - record 17
00873                                                 /*
00874                                                 {
00875 
00876                                                       SOLDIERTYPE *                             pSoldier;
00877                                                       INT8                                                  bMoney;
00878                                                       INT8                                                  bEmptySlot;
00879 
00880                                                       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( DARREN, FALSE );
00881                                                       bMoney = FindObjWithin( pSoldier, MONEY, BIGPOCK1POS, SMALLPOCK8POS );
00882                                                       bEmptySlot = FindObjWithin( pSoldier, NOTHING, BIGPOCK1POS, SMALLPOCK8POS );
00883                                                 }
00884                                                 */
00885 
00886                                                 // record amount of bet
00887                                                 gMercProfiles[ DARREN ].iBalance = pObj->uiMoneyAmount;
00888                                                 SetFactFalse( FACT_DARREN_EXPECTING_MONEY );
00889 
00890                                                 // if never fought before, use record 17
00891                                                 // if fought before, today, use record 31
00892                                                 // else use record 18
00893                                                 if ( ! ( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ DARREN ][ 17 ].fFlags & QUOTE_FLAG_SAID ) ) // record 17 not used
00894                                                 {
00895                                                       (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[17];
00896                                                       (*pubQuoteNum)       = 17;
00897                                                 }
00898                                                 else 
00899                                                 {
00900                                                       // find Kingpin, if he's in his house, invoke the script to move him to the bar
00901                                                       SOLDIERTYPE *           pKingpin;
00902                                                       UINT8                               ubKingpinRoom;
00903 
00904                                                       pKingpin = FindSoldierByProfileID( KINGPIN, FALSE );
00905                                                       if ( pKingpin && InARoom( pKingpin->sGridNo, &ubKingpinRoom ) )
00906                                                       {
00907                                                             if ( IN_KINGPIN_HOUSE( ubKingpinRoom ) )
00908                                                             {
00909                                                                   // first boxer, bring kingpin over
00910                                                                   (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[17];
00911                                                                   (*pubQuoteNum)       = 17;
00912                                                             }
00913                                                             else
00914                                                             {
00915                                                                   (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[31];
00916                                                                   (*pubQuoteNum)       = 31;
00917                                                             }
00918                                                       }
00919                                                       else
00920                                                       {
00921                                                             (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[31];
00922                                                             (*pubQuoteNum)       = 31;
00923                                                       }
00924 
00925                                                 }
00926                                                 
00927                                                 return( (*ppResultQuoteInfo)->ubOpinionRequired );
00928                                           }
00929                                     }
00930                                     break;
00931                               case ANGEL: 
00932                                     if (usItemToConsider == MONEY && pNPCQuoteInfo->sActionData == NPC_ACTION_ANGEL_GIVEN_CASH)
00933                                     {
00934                                           if (pObj->uiMoneyAmount < Item[LEATHER_JACKET_W_KEVLAR].usPrice)
00935                                           {
00936                                                 // refuse, bet too low - record 8
00937                                                 (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[8];
00938                                                 (*pubQuoteNum)       = 8;
00939                                                 return( (*ppResultQuoteInfo)->ubOpinionRequired );
00940                                           }
00941                                           else if (pObj->uiMoneyAmount > Item[LEATHER_JACKET_W_KEVLAR].usPrice)
00942                                           {
00943                                                 // refuse, bet too high - record 9
00944                                                 (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[9];
00945                                                 (*pubQuoteNum)       = 9;
00946                                                 return( (*ppResultQuoteInfo)->ubOpinionRequired );
00947                                           }
00948                                           else
00949                                           {
00950                                                 // accept - record 10
00951                                                 (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[10];
00952                                                 (*pubQuoteNum)       = 10;
00953                                                 return( (*ppResultQuoteInfo)->ubOpinionRequired );
00954                                           }
00955                                     }
00956                                     break;
00957                               case MADAME:
00958                                     if ( usItemToConsider == MONEY )
00959                                     {
00960                                           if ( gMercProfiles[ ubMerc ].bSex == FEMALE )
00961                                           {
00962                                                 // say quote about not catering to women!
00963                                                 (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[5];
00964                                                 (*pubQuoteNum)       = 5;
00965                                                 return( (*ppResultQuoteInfo)->ubOpinionRequired );                                        
00966                                           }
00967                                           switch( pObj->uiMoneyAmount )
00968                                           {
00969                                                 case 100:
00970                                                 case 200: // Carla
00971                                                       if ( CheckFact( FACT_CARLA_AVAILABLE, 0 ) )
00972                                                       {
00973                                                             gMercProfiles[ MADAME ].bNPCData += (INT8) (pObj->uiMoneyAmount / 100);
00974                                                             TriggerNPCRecord( MADAME, 16 );
00975                                                       }
00976                                                       else
00977                                                       {
00978                                                             // see default case
00979                                                             (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[25];
00980                                                             (*pubQuoteNum)       = 25;
00981                                                             return( (*ppResultQuoteInfo)->ubOpinionRequired );
00982                                                       }
00983                                                       break;
00984                                                 case 500:
00985                                                 case 1000: // Cindy
00986                                                       if ( CheckFact( FACT_CINDY_AVAILABLE, 0 ) )
00987                                                       {
00988                                                             gMercProfiles[ MADAME ].bNPCData += (INT8) (pObj->uiMoneyAmount / 500);
00989                                                             TriggerNPCRecord( MADAME, 17 );
00990                                                       }
00991                                                       else
00992                                                       {
00993                                                             // see default case
00994                                                             (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[25];
00995                                                             (*pubQuoteNum)       = 25;
00996                                                             return( (*ppResultQuoteInfo)->ubOpinionRequired );
00997                                                       }
00998                                                       break;
00999                                                 case 300:
01000                                                 case 600: // Bambi
01001                                                       if ( CheckFact( FACT_BAMBI_AVAILABLE, 0 ) )
01002                                                       {
01003                                                             gMercProfiles[ MADAME ].bNPCData += (INT8) (pObj->uiMoneyAmount / 300);
01004                                                             TriggerNPCRecord( MADAME, 18 );
01005                                                       }
01006                                                       else
01007                                                       {
01008                                                             // see default case
01009                                                             (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[25];
01010                                                             (*pubQuoteNum)       = 25;
01011                                                             return( (*ppResultQuoteInfo)->ubOpinionRequired );
01012                                                       }
01013                                                       break;
01014                                                 case 400:
01015                                                 case 800: // Maria?                                                     
01016                                                       if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_RESCUE_MARIA ] == QUESTINPROGRESS )
01017                                                       {
01018                                                             gMercProfiles[ MADAME ].bNPCData += (INT8) (pObj->uiMoneyAmount / 400);
01019                                                             TriggerNPCRecord( MADAME, 19 );
01020                                                             break;
01021                                                       }
01022                                                       else
01023                                                       {
01024                                                             // see default case
01025                                                             (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[25];
01026                                                             (*pubQuoteNum)       = 25;
01027                                                             return( (*ppResultQuoteInfo)->ubOpinionRequired );
01028                                                       }
01029                                                       break;
01030                                                 default:
01031                                                       // play quotes 39-42 (plus 44 if quest 22 on) plus 43 if >1 PC
01032                                                       // and return money
01033                                                       (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[25];
01034                                                       (*pubQuoteNum)       = 25;
01035                                                       return( (*ppResultQuoteInfo)->ubOpinionRequired );
01036                                           }
01037 
01038                                     }
01039                                     break;
01040                               case JOE:
01041                                     if ( ubNPC == JOE && usItemToConsider == MONEY && pNPCQuoteInfo->sActionData != NPC_ACTION_JOE_GIVEN_CASH )
01042                                     {
01043                                           break;
01044                                     }
01045                                     // else fall through
01046                               case GERARD:
01047                                     if ( ubNPC == GERARD && usItemToConsider == MONEY && pNPCQuoteInfo->sActionData != NPC_ACTION_GERARD_GIVEN_CASH )
01048                                     {
01049                                           break;
01050                                     }
01051                                     // else fall through
01052                               case STEVE:
01053                               case VINCE:
01054                               case WALTER:
01055                               case FRANK:
01056                                     if (usItemToConsider == MONEY)
01057                                     {
01058                                           if ( ubNPC == VINCE || ubNPC == STEVE )
01059                                           {
01060                                                 if ( CheckFact( FACT_VINCE_EXPECTING_MONEY, ubNPC ) == FALSE && gMercProfiles[ ubNPC ].iBalance < 0 && pNPCQuoteInfo->sActionData != NPC_ACTION_DONT_ACCEPT_ITEM )
01061                                                 {
01062                                                       // increment balance
01063                                                       gMercProfiles[ ubNPC ].iBalance += (INT32) pObj->uiMoneyAmount;
01064                                                       gMercProfiles[ ubNPC ].uiTotalCostToDate += pObj->uiMoneyAmount;
01065                                                       if ( gMercProfiles[ ubNPC ].iBalance > 0 )
01066                                                       {
01067                                                             gMercProfiles[ ubNPC ].iBalance = 0;
01068                                                       }
01069                                                       ScreenMsg( FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ BALANCE_OWED_STR ], gMercProfiles[ubNPC].zNickname, -gMercProfiles[ubNPC].iBalance );
01070                                                 }
01071                                                 else if ( CheckFact( FACT_VINCE_EXPECTING_MONEY, ubNPC ) == FALSE && pNPCQuoteInfo->sActionData != NPC_ACTION_DONT_ACCEPT_ITEM )
01072                                                 {
01073                                                       // just accept cash!
01074                                                       if ( ubNPC == VINCE )
01075                                                       {
01076                                                             (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ 8 ];
01077                                                       }
01078                                                       else
01079                                                       {
01080                                                             (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ 7 ];
01081                                                       }                                                     
01082                                                       return( (*ppResultQuoteInfo)->ubOpinionRequired );
01083                                                 }
01084                                                 else
01085                                                 {
01086                                                       // handle the player giving NPC some money
01087                                                       HandleNPCBeingGivenMoneyByPlayer( ubNPC, pObj->uiMoneyAmount, pubQuoteNum );
01088                                                       (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ *pubQuoteNum ];
01089                                                       return( (*ppResultQuoteInfo)->ubOpinionRequired );
01090                                                 }
01091                                           }
01092                                           else
01093                                           {
01094                                                 // handle the player giving NPC some money
01095                                                 HandleNPCBeingGivenMoneyByPlayer( ubNPC, pObj->uiMoneyAmount, pubQuoteNum );
01096                                                 (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ *pubQuoteNum ];
01097                                                 return( (*ppResultQuoteInfo)->ubOpinionRequired );
01098                                           }
01099                                     }
01100                                     break;
01101                               case KINGPIN:
01102                                     if ( usItemToConsider == MONEY && gubQuest[ QUEST_KINGPIN_MONEY ] == QUESTINPROGRESS )
01103                                     {
01104                                           HandleNPCBeingGivenMoneyByPlayer( ubNPC, pObj->uiMoneyAmount, pubQuoteNum );
01105                                           (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = &pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ *pubQuoteNum ];
01106                                           return( (*ppResultQuoteInfo)->ubOpinionRequired );
01107                                     }
01108                                     break;
01109                               default:
01110                                     if ( usItemToConsider == MONEY && (ubNPC == SKYRIDER || (ubNPC >= FIRST_RPC && ubNPC < FIRST_NPC) ) )
01111                                     {
01112                                           if ( gMercProfiles[ ubNPC ].iBalance < 0 && pNPCQuoteInfo->sActionData != NPC_ACTION_DONT_ACCEPT_ITEM )
01113                                           {
01114                                                 // increment balance
01115                                                 gMercProfiles[ ubNPC ].iBalance += (INT32) pObj->uiMoneyAmount;
01116                                                 gMercProfiles[ ubNPC ].uiTotalCostToDate += pObj->uiMoneyAmount;
01117                                                 if ( gMercProfiles[ ubNPC ].iBalance > 0 )
01118                                                 {
01119                                                       gMercProfiles[ ubNPC ].iBalance = 0;
01120                                                 }
01121                                                 ScreenMsg( FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ BALANCE_OWED_STR ], gMercProfiles[ubNPC].zNickname, -gMercProfiles[ubNPC].iBalance );
01122                                           }
01123                                     }
01124                                     break;
01125                         }
01126                         // This is great!
01127                         // Return desire value
01128                         (*ppResultQuoteInfo) = pNPCQuoteInfo;
01129                         (*pubQuoteNum)       = ubLoop;
01130 
01131                         return( pNPCQuoteInfo->ubOpinionRequired );
01132                   }
01133             }
01134       }
01135 
01136       return( 0 );
01137 }
01138 
01139 BOOLEAN HandleNPCBeingGivenMoneyByPlayer( UINT8 ubNPC, UINT32 uiMoneyAmount, UINT8 *pQuoteValue )
01140 {
01141       switch( ubNPC )
01142       {
01143             // handle for STEVE and VINCE
01144             case STEVE:
01145             case VINCE:
01146                   {
01147                         INT32       iCost;
01148 
01149                         iCost = (INT32) CalcMedicalCost( ubNPC );
01150                         
01151                         // check amount of money
01152                         if ( (INT32)uiMoneyAmount + giHospitalTempBalance + giHospitalRefund >= iCost )
01153                         {
01154                               // enough cash, check how much help is needed
01155                               if( CheckFact( FACT_WOUNDED_MERCS_NEARBY , ubNPC) )
01156                               {
01157                                     *pQuoteValue = 26;
01158                               }
01159                               else if( CheckFact( FACT_ONE_WOUNDED_MERC_NEARBY, ubNPC ) )
01160                               {
01161                                     *pQuoteValue = 25;
01162                               }
01163                               
01164                               if ( giHospitalRefund > 0 )
01165                               {
01166                                     giHospitalRefund = __max( 0, giHospitalRefund - iCost + uiMoneyAmount );
01167                               }
01168                               giHospitalTempBalance = 0;
01169                         }
01170                         else
01171                         {
01172                               INT16       sTempString[ 100 ];
01173 
01174                               swprintf( (wchar_t *)sTempString, L"%ld", iCost - uiMoneyAmount - giHospitalTempBalance );
01175                               InsertDollarSignInToString( sTempString );
01176 
01177                               // not enough cash
01178                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, 
01179                                     MSG_INTERFACE,
01180                                     Message[ STR_NEED_TO_GIVE_MONEY ],
01181                                     gMercProfiles[ ubNPC ].zNickname,
01182                                     sTempString );
01183                               *pQuoteValue = 27;
01184                               giHospitalTempBalance += uiMoneyAmount;
01185                         }
01186                   }
01187                   break;
01188             case KINGPIN:     
01189                   if ( (INT32) uiMoneyAmount < -gMercProfiles[ KINGPIN ].iBalance )
01190                   {
01191                         *pQuoteValue = 9;
01192                   }
01193                   else
01194                   {
01195                         *pQuoteValue = 10;
01196                   }
01197                   gMercProfiles[ KINGPIN ].iBalance += (INT32) uiMoneyAmount;
01198                   break;
01199             case WALTER:
01200                   if ( gMercProfiles[ WALTER ].iBalance == 0 )
01201                   {
01202                         *pQuoteValue = 12;
01203                   }
01204                   else
01205                   {
01206                         *pQuoteValue = 13;
01207                   }
01208                   gMercProfiles[ WALTER ].iBalance += uiMoneyAmount;
01209                   break;
01210             case FRANK:
01211                   gArmsDealerStatus[ ARMS_DEALER_FRANK ].uiArmsDealersCash += uiMoneyAmount;
01212                   break;
01213             case GERARD:
01214                   gMercProfiles[ GERARD ].iBalance += uiMoneyAmount;
01215                   if ( (gMercProfiles[ GERARD ].iBalance) >= 10000 )
01216                   {
01217                         *pQuoteValue = 12;
01218                   }
01219                   else
01220                   {
01221                         *pQuoteValue = 11;
01222                   }
01223                   break;
01224             case JOE:
01225                   gMercProfiles[ JOE ].iBalance += uiMoneyAmount;
01226                   if ( (gMercProfiles[ JOE ].iBalance) >= 10000 )
01227                   {
01228                         *pQuoteValue = 7;
01229                   }
01230                   else
01231                   {
01232                         *pQuoteValue = 6;
01233                   }
01234                   break;
01235       }
01236 
01237       return( TRUE );
01238 }
01239 
01240 UINT8 NPCConsiderQuote( UINT8 ubNPC, UINT8 ubMerc, UINT8 ubApproach, UINT8 ubQuoteNum, UINT8 ubTalkDesire, NPCQuoteInfo * pNPCQuoteInfoArray )
01241 {
01242       //This function looks at a quote and determines if conditions for it have been met.
01243       // Returns 0 if none , 1 if one is found
01244       MERCPROFILESTRUCT *           pNPCProfile;
01245       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pNPCQuoteInfo;
01246       UINT32                                                uiDay;
01247       BOOLEAN                                               fTrue;
01248 
01249       if ( ubNPC == NO_PROFILE )
01250       {
01251             pNPCProfile = NULL;
01252       }
01253       else
01254       {
01255             pNPCProfile = &(gMercProfiles[ubNPC]);
01256       }
01257       
01258       // How much do we want to talk with this merc?
01259       uiDay = GetWorldDay();
01260 
01261       pNPCQuoteInfo = &(pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubQuoteNum]);
01262 
01263       #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01264             if ( ubNPC != NO_PROFILE && ubMerc != NO_PROFILE )
01265             {
01266                   NpcRecordLoggingInit( ubNPC, ubMerc, ubQuoteNum, ubApproach );
01267             }
01268       #endif
01269 
01270       if (CHECK_FLAG( pNPCQuoteInfo->fFlags, QUOTE_FLAG_SAID ))
01271       {
01272             #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01273                   //Add entry to the quest debug file
01274                   NpcRecordLogging( ubApproach, "Quote Already Said, leaving");
01275             #endif
01276             // skip quotes already said
01277             return( FALSE );
01278       }
01279 
01280       // if the quote is quest-specific, is the player on that quest?
01281       if (pNPCQuoteInfo->ubQuest != NO_QUEST)
01282       {
01283             #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01284                   //Add entry to the quest debug file
01285                   NpcRecordLogging( ubApproach, "Quest(%d:'%S') Must be in Progress, status is %d. %s", pNPCQuoteInfo->ubQuest, QuestDescText[ pNPCQuoteInfo->ubQuest ], gubQuest[pNPCQuoteInfo->ubQuest], (gubQuest[pNPCQuoteInfo->ubQuest] != QUESTINPROGRESS) ? "False, return" : "True" );
01286             #endif
01287 
01288             if (pNPCQuoteInfo->ubQuest > QUEST_DONE_NUM)    
01289             {
01290                   if (gubQuest[pNPCQuoteInfo->ubQuest - QUEST_DONE_NUM] != QUESTDONE)
01291                   {
01292                         return( FALSE );
01293                   }
01294             }
01295             else if (pNPCQuoteInfo->ubQuest > QUEST_NOT_STARTED_NUM)
01296             {
01297                   if (gubQuest[pNPCQuoteInfo->ubQuest - QUEST_NOT_STARTED_NUM] != QUESTNOTSTARTED)
01298                   {
01299                         return( FALSE );
01300                   }
01301             }
01302             else
01303             {
01304                   if (gubQuest[pNPCQuoteInfo->ubQuest] != QUESTINPROGRESS)
01305                   {
01306                         return( FALSE );
01307                   }
01308             }
01309       }
01310 
01311       // if there are facts to be checked, check them
01312       if (pNPCQuoteInfo->usFactMustBeTrue != NO_FACT)
01313       {
01314             fTrue = CheckFact( pNPCQuoteInfo->usFactMustBeTrue, ubNPC );
01315             #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01316                   //Add entry to the quest debug file
01317                   NpcRecordLogging( ubApproach, "Fact (%d:'%S') Must be True, status is %s", pNPCQuoteInfo->usFactMustBeTrue, FactDescText[pNPCQuoteInfo->usFactMustBeTrue], (fTrue == FALSE) ? "False, returning" : "True" );
01318             #endif            
01319             if (fTrue == FALSE)
01320             {
01321                   return( FALSE );
01322             }
01323 
01324 
01325       }
01326 
01327       if (pNPCQuoteInfo->usFactMustBeFalse != NO_FACT)
01328       {
01329             fTrue = CheckFact( pNPCQuoteInfo->usFactMustBeFalse, ubNPC );
01330 
01331             #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01332                   //Add entry to the quest debug file
01333                   NpcRecordLogging( ubApproach, "Fact(%d:'%S') Must be False status is  %s", pNPCQuoteInfo->usFactMustBeFalse, FactDescText[pNPCQuoteInfo->usFactMustBeFalse], (fTrue == TRUE) ? "True, return" : "FALSE" );
01334             #endif
01335             
01336             if (fTrue == TRUE)
01337             {
01338 
01339                   return( FALSE );
01340             }
01341       }
01342       
01343       // check for required approach
01344       // since the "I hate you" code triggers the record, triggering has to work properly
01345       // with the other value that is stored!   
01346       if ( pNPCQuoteInfo->ubApproachRequired || !(ubApproach == APPROACH_FRIENDLY || ubApproach == APPROACH_DIRECT || ubApproach == TRIGGER_NPC ) )
01347       {
01348             #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01349                   //Add entry to the quest debug file
01350             NpcRecordLogging( ubApproach, "Approach Taken(%d) must equal required Approach(%d) = %s", ubApproach, pNPCQuoteInfo->ubApproachRequired, (ubApproach != pNPCQuoteInfo->ubApproachRequired) ? "TRUE, return" : "FALSE" );
01351             #endif
01352 
01353             if ( pNPCQuoteInfo->ubApproachRequired == APPROACH_ONE_OF_FOUR_STANDARD )
01354             {
01355                   // friendly to recruit will match
01356                   if ( ubApproach < APPROACH_FRIENDLY || ubApproach > APPROACH_RECRUIT )
01357                   {
01358                         return( FALSE );
01359                   }
01360             }
01361             else if ( pNPCQuoteInfo->ubApproachRequired == APPROACH_FRIENDLY_DIRECT_OR_RECRUIT )
01362             {
01363                   if ( ubApproach != APPROACH_FRIENDLY && ubApproach != APPROACH_DIRECT && ubApproach != APPROACH_RECRUIT )
01364                   {
01365                         return( FALSE );
01366                   }
01367             }
01368             else if (ubApproach != pNPCQuoteInfo->ubApproachRequired)
01369             {
01370                   return( FALSE );
01371             }
01372       }
01373 
01374       // check time constraints on the quotes
01375       if (pNPCProfile != NULL && pNPCQuoteInfo->ubFirstDay == MUST_BE_NEW_DAY)
01376       {
01377             #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01378                   //Add entry to the quest debug file
01379                   NpcRecordLogging( ubApproach, "Time constraints. Current Day(%d) must <= Day last spoken too (%d) : %s", uiDay, pNPCProfile->ubLastDateSpokenTo, (uiDay <= pNPCProfile->ubLastDateSpokenTo) ? "TRUE, return" : "FALSE" );
01380             #endif
01381 
01382             if (uiDay <= pNPCProfile->ubLastDateSpokenTo)
01383             {
01384                   // too early!
01385                   return( FALSE );
01386             }
01387       }
01388       else if (uiDay < pNPCQuoteInfo->ubFirstDay)
01389       {
01390             #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01391                   //Add entry to the quest debug file
01392             NpcRecordLogging( ubApproach, "Current Day(%d) is before Required first day(%d) = %s", uiDay, pNPCQuoteInfo->ubFirstDay, (uiDay < pNPCQuoteInfo->ubFirstDay) ? "False, returning" : "True" );
01393             #endif
01394             // too early!
01395             return( FALSE );
01396       }
01397 
01398       if (uiDay > pNPCQuoteInfo->ubLastDay && uiDay < 255 )
01399       {
01400             #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01401                   //Add entry to the quest debug file
01402             NpcRecordLogging( ubApproach, "Current Day(%d) is after Required first day(%d) = %s", uiDay, pNPCQuoteInfo->ubFirstDay, (uiDay > pNPCQuoteInfo->ubLastDay) ? "TRUE, returning" : "FALSE" );
01403             #endif
01404 
01405             // too late!
01406             return( FALSE );
01407       }
01408 
01409       // check opinion required
01410       if ((pNPCQuoteInfo->ubOpinionRequired != IRRELEVANT) && (ubApproach != TRIGGER_NPC))
01411       {
01412             #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01413                   //Add entry to the quest debug file
01414             NpcRecordLogging( ubApproach, "Opinion Required.  Talk Desire (%d), Opinion Required(%d) : %s", ubTalkDesire, pNPCQuoteInfo->ubOpinionRequired, (ubTalkDesire < pNPCQuoteInfo->ubOpinionRequired) ? "False, return" : "False, continue" );
01415             #endif
01416 
01417             if (ubTalkDesire < pNPCQuoteInfo->ubOpinionRequired )
01418             {
01419                   return( FALSE );
01420             }
01421       }
01422 
01423 
01424 
01425       #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01426             //Add entry to the quest debug file
01427       NpcRecordLogging( ubApproach, "Return the quote opinion value! = TRUE");
01428       #endif
01429 
01430       // Return the quote opinion value!
01431       return( TRUE );
01432 
01433 }
01434 
01435 
01436 void ReplaceLocationInNPCData( NPCQuoteInfo * pNPCQuoteInfoArray, INT16 sOldGridNo, INT16 sNewGridNo )
01437 {
01438       UINT8                                     ubFirstQuoteRecord, ubLastQuoteRecord, ubLoop;
01439       NPCQuoteInfo *          pNPCQuoteInfo;
01440 
01441       ubFirstQuoteRecord = 0;
01442       ubLastQuoteRecord = NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS - 1;
01443       for (ubLoop = ubFirstQuoteRecord; ubLoop <= ubLastQuoteRecord; ubLoop++)
01444       {
01445             pNPCQuoteInfo = &(pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubLoop ]);
01446             if (sOldGridNo == -pNPCQuoteInfo->sRequiredGridno)
01447             {
01448                   pNPCQuoteInfo->sRequiredGridno = -sNewGridNo;
01449             }
01450             if (sOldGridNo == pNPCQuoteInfo->usGoToGridno)
01451             {
01452                   pNPCQuoteInfo->usGoToGridno = sNewGridNo;
01453             }
01454       }
01455 }
01456 
01457 void ReplaceLocationInNPCDataFromProfileID( UINT8 ubNPC, INT16 sOldGridNo, INT16 sNewGridNo )
01458 {
01459       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pNPCQuoteInfoArray;
01460 
01461       if (EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubNPC ) == FALSE)
01462       {
01463             // error!!!
01464             return;
01465       }
01466 
01467       pNPCQuoteInfoArray = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC];
01468 
01469       ReplaceLocationInNPCData( pNPCQuoteInfoArray, sOldGridNo, sNewGridNo );
01470 
01471 }
01472 
01473 
01474 void ResetOncePerConvoRecords( NPCQuoteInfo * pNPCQuoteInfoArray )
01475 {
01476       UINT8                                                 ubLoop;
01477 
01478       for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS; ubLoop++ )
01479       {
01480             if ( CHECK_FLAG(pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubLoop].fFlags, QUOTE_FLAG_SAY_ONCE_PER_CONVO) )
01481             {
01482                   TURN_FLAG_OFF( pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubLoop].fFlags, QUOTE_FLAG_SAID );
01483             }
01484       }
01485 }
01486 
01487 void ResetOncePerConvoRecordsForNPC( UINT8 ubNPC )
01488 {
01489       if (EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubNPC ) == FALSE)
01490       {
01491             // error!!!
01492             return;
01493       }
01494       ResetOncePerConvoRecords( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNPC ] );
01495 }
01496 
01497 void ResetOncePerConvoRecordsForAllNPCsInLoadedSector( void )
01498 {
01499       UINT8 ubLoop;
01500 
01501       if ( gWorldSectorX == 0 || gWorldSectorY == 0 )
01502       {
01503             return;
01504       }
01505 
01506       for ( ubLoop = FIRST_RPC; ubLoop < GASTON; ubLoop++ )
01507       {
01508             if ( gMercProfiles[ ubLoop ].sSectorX == gWorldSectorX && 
01509                          gMercProfiles[ ubLoop ].sSectorY == gWorldSectorY && 
01510                          gMercProfiles[ ubLoop ].bSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ &&
01511                          gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubLoop ] != NULL ) 
01512             {
01513                   ResetOncePerConvoRecordsForNPC( ubLoop );
01514             }
01515       }
01516 }
01517 
01518 
01519 void ReturnItemToPlayerIfNecessary( UINT8 ubMerc, INT8 bApproach, UINT32 uiApproachData, NPCQuoteInfo * pQuotePtr )
01520 {
01521       OBJECTTYPE  *           pObj;
01522       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
01523 
01524       // if the approach was changed, always return the item
01525       // otherwise check to see if the record in question specified refusal
01526       if ( bApproach != APPROACH_GIVINGITEM || (pQuotePtr == NULL ) || (pQuotePtr->sActionData == NPC_ACTION_DONT_ACCEPT_ITEM ) )
01527       {
01528             pObj = (OBJECTTYPE *) uiApproachData;
01529 
01530             // Find the merc
01531             pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubMerc, FALSE );
01532 
01533             // Try to auto place object and then if it fails, put into cursor
01534             if ( !AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, pObj, FALSE ) )
01535             {
01536                   InternalBeginItemPointer( pSoldier, pObj, NO_SLOT );
01537             }
01538             DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );     
01539       }
01540 }
01541 
01542 void Converse( UINT8 ubNPC, UINT8 ubMerc, INT8 bApproach, UINT32 uiApproachData )
01543 {
01544       NPCQuoteInfo                              QuoteInfo;
01545       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pQuotePtr = &(QuoteInfo);
01546       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pNPCQuoteInfoArray=NULL;
01547       MERCPROFILESTRUCT *           pProfile=NULL;
01548       UINT8                                                 ubLoop, ubQuoteNum, ubRecordNum;
01549       SOLDIERTYPE *                             pSoldier=NULL;
01550       UINT32                                                uiDay;
01551       OBJECTTYPE *                              pObj=NULL;
01552       SOLDIERTYPE *                             pNPC;
01553       BOOLEAN                                               fAttemptingToGiveItem;
01554 
01555       // we have to record whether an item is being given in order to determine whether,
01556       // in the case where the approach is overridden, we need to return the item to the
01557       // player
01558       fAttemptingToGiveItem = (bApproach == APPROACH_GIVINGITEM);
01559 
01560       pNPC = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubNPC, FALSE );
01561       if ( pNPC )
01562       {
01563             // set delay for civ AI movement
01564             pNPC->uiTimeSinceLastSpoke = GetJA2Clock();
01565 
01566             if ( CheckFact( FACT_CURRENT_SECTOR_IS_SAFE, ubNPC ) == FALSE )
01567             {
01568                   if ( bApproach != TRIGGER_NPC && bApproach != APPROACH_GIVEFIRSTAID && bApproach != APPROACH_DECLARATION_OF_HOSTILITY && bApproach != APPROACH_ENEMY_NPC_QUOTE )
01569                   {
01570                         if ( NPCHasUnusedRecordWithGivenApproach( ubNPC, APPROACH_SECTOR_NOT_SAFE ) )
01571                         {
01572                               // override with sector-not-safe approach
01573                               bApproach = APPROACH_SECTOR_NOT_SAFE;
01574                         }
01575                   }
01576             }
01577 
01578             // make sure civ is awake now
01579             pNPC->fAIFlags &= (~AI_ASLEEP);
01580       }
01581 
01582       if (EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubNPC ) == FALSE)
01583       {
01584             // error!!!
01585 
01586             if ( fAttemptingToGiveItem ) 
01587             {
01588                   ReturnItemToPlayerIfNecessary( ubMerc, bApproach, uiApproachData, NULL );
01589             }
01590             return;
01591       }
01592       pNPCQuoteInfoArray = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC];
01593 
01594       pProfile = &(gMercProfiles[ubNPC]);
01595       switch( bApproach )
01596       {
01597             case NPC_INITIAL_QUOTE:
01598                   // reset stuff
01599                   ResetOncePerConvoRecords( pNPCQuoteInfoArray );
01600 
01601                   // CHEAP HACK
01602                   // Since we don't have CONDITIONAL once-per-convo refreshes, do this in code
01603                   // NB fact 281 is 'Darren has explained boxing rules'
01604                   if ( ubNPC == DARREN && CheckFact( 281, DARREN ) == FALSE )
01605                   {
01606                         TURN_FLAG_OFF( pNPCQuoteInfoArray[11].fFlags, QUOTE_FLAG_SAID );
01607                   }
01608 
01609                   // turn the NPC to face us
01610                   // this '1' value is a dummy....
01611                   NPCDoAction( ubNPC, NPC_ACTION_TURN_TO_FACE_NEAREST_MERC, 1 );
01612                               
01613                   if (pProfile->ubLastDateSpokenTo > 0)
01614                   {
01615                         uiDay = GetWorldDay();
01616                         if (uiDay > pProfile->ubLastDateSpokenTo)
01617                         {
01618                               NPCConsiderTalking( ubNPC, ubMerc, APPROACH_SPECIAL_INITIAL_QUOTE, 0, pNPCQuoteInfoArray, &pQuotePtr, &ubRecordNum );
01619                               if (pQuotePtr != NULL)
01620                               {
01621                                     // converse using this approach instead!
01622                                     if ( fAttemptingToGiveItem ) 
01623                                     {
01624                                           ReturnItemToPlayerIfNecessary( ubMerc, bApproach, uiApproachData, NULL );
01625                                     }
01626                                     Converse( ubNPC, ubMerc, APPROACH_SPECIAL_INITIAL_QUOTE, 0 );
01627                                     return;
01628                               }
01629                               // subsequent times approached intro
01630                               ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_SUBS_INTRO;
01631                         }
01632                         else
01633                         {
01634                               // say nothing!
01635                               if ( fAttemptingToGiveItem ) 
01636                               {
01637                                     ReturnItemToPlayerIfNecessary( ubMerc, bApproach, uiApproachData, NULL );
01638                               }
01639                               return;
01640                         }
01641                   }
01642                   else
01643                   {
01644                         // try special initial quote first
01645                         NPCConsiderTalking( ubNPC, ubMerc, APPROACH_SPECIAL_INITIAL_QUOTE, 0, pNPCQuoteInfoArray, &pQuotePtr, &ubRecordNum );
01646                         if (pQuotePtr != NULL)
01647                         {
01648                               // converse using this approach instead!
01649                               if ( fAttemptingToGiveItem ) 
01650                               {
01651                                     ReturnItemToPlayerIfNecessary( ubMerc, bApproach, uiApproachData, NULL );
01652                               }
01653                               Converse( ubNPC, ubMerc, APPROACH_SPECIAL_INITIAL_QUOTE, 0 );
01654                               return;
01655                         }
01656 
01657                         NPCConsiderTalking( ubNPC, ubMerc, APPROACH_INITIAL_QUOTE, 0, pNPCQuoteInfoArray, &pQuotePtr, &ubRecordNum );
01658                         if (pQuotePtr != NULL)
01659                         {
01660                               // converse using this approach instead!
01661                               if ( fAttemptingToGiveItem ) 
01662                               {
01663                                     ReturnItemToPlayerIfNecessary( ubMerc, bApproach, uiApproachData, NULL );
01664                               }
01665                               Converse( ubNPC, ubMerc, APPROACH_INITIAL_QUOTE, 0 );
01666                               return;
01667                         }
01668 
01669                         // first time approached intro
01670                         ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_INTRO;
01671                   }
01672                   TalkingMenuDialogue( ubQuoteNum );
01673                   pProfile->ubLastQuoteSaid = ubQuoteNum;
01674                   pProfile->bLastQuoteSaidWasSpecial = FALSE;
01675                   break;
01676             case NPC_WHOAREYOU:
01677                   ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_INTRO;
01678                   TalkingMenuDialogue( ubQuoteNum );
01679                   // For now, DO NOT remember for 'Come again?'
01680                   break;
01681             case APPROACH_REPEAT:
01682                   if (pProfile->ubLastQuoteSaid == NO_QUOTE)
01683                   {
01684                         // this should never occur now!
01685                         TalkingMenuDialogue( QUOTE_INTRO );
01686                   }
01687                   else
01688                   {
01689                         if (pProfile->bLastQuoteSaidWasSpecial)
01690                         {
01691                               pQuotePtr = &(pNPCQuoteInfoArray[pProfile->ubLastQuoteSaid]);
01692                               // say quote and following consecutive quotes
01693                               for (ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < pQuotePtr->ubNumQuotes; ubLoop++)
01694                               {
01695                                     // say quote #(pQuotePtr->ubQuoteNum + ubLoop)
01696                                     TalkingMenuDialogue( (UINT8)( pQuotePtr->ubQuoteNum + ubLoop ) );
01697                               }
01698                         }
01699                         else
01700                         {
01701                               TalkingMenuDialogue( pProfile->ubLastQuoteSaid );
01702                         }
01703                   }
01704                   break;
01705             default:
01706                   switch( bApproach )
01707                   {
01708                         case APPROACH_GIVINGITEM:
01709                               // first start by triggering any introduction quote if there is one...
01710                               if ( pProfile->ubLastDateSpokenTo > 0)
01711                               {
01712                                     uiDay = GetWorldDay();
01713                                     if (uiDay > pProfile->ubLastDateSpokenTo)
01714                                     {
01715                                           NPCConsiderTalking( ubNPC, ubMerc, APPROACH_SPECIAL_INITIAL_QUOTE, 0, pNPCQuoteInfoArray, &pQuotePtr, &ubRecordNum );
01716                                           if (pQuotePtr != NULL)
01717                                           {
01718                                                 // converse using this approach instead!
01719                                                 Converse( ubNPC, ubMerc, APPROACH_SPECIAL_INITIAL_QUOTE, 0 );
01720 
01721                                                 if ( ubNPC == DARREN )
01722                                                 {
01723                                                       // then we have to make this give attempt fail
01724                                                       ReturnItemToPlayerIfNecessary( ubMerc, bApproach, uiApproachData, NULL );
01725                                                       return;
01726                                                 }
01727                                           }
01728                                     }
01729                               }
01730                               else
01731                               {
01732                                     NPCConsiderTalking( ubNPC, ubMerc, APPROACH_INITIAL_QUOTE, 0, pNPCQuoteInfoArray, &pQuotePtr, &ubRecordNum );
01733                                     if (pQuotePtr != NULL)
01734                                     {
01735                                           // converse using this approach instead!
01736                                           Converse( ubNPC, ubMerc, APPROACH_INITIAL_QUOTE, 0 );
01737                                     }
01738                               }
01739 
01740                               // If we are approaching because we want to give an item, do something different
01741                               pObj = (OBJECTTYPE *) uiApproachData;
01742                               NPCConsiderReceivingItemFromMerc( ubNPC, ubMerc, pObj, pNPCQuoteInfoArray, &pQuotePtr, &ubRecordNum );
01743                               break;
01744                         case TRIGGER_NPC:
01745                               // if triggering, pass in the approach data as the record to consider
01746                               DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_0, String( "Handling trigger %S/%d at %ld", gMercProfiles[ ubNPC ].zNickname, (UINT8)uiApproachData, GetJA2Clock() ) );
01747                               NPCConsiderTalking( ubNPC, ubMerc, bApproach, (UINT8)uiApproachData, pNPCQuoteInfoArray, &pQuotePtr, &ubRecordNum );
01748                               break;
01749                         default:
01750                               NPCConsiderTalking( ubNPC, ubMerc, bApproach, 0, pNPCQuoteInfoArray, &pQuotePtr, &ubRecordNum );
01751                               break;
01752                   }
01753                   if (pQuotePtr == NULL)
01754                   {
01755                         // say random everyday quote
01756                         // do NOT set last quote said!
01757                         switch( bApproach )
01758                         {
01759                               case APPROACH_FRIENDLY:
01760                                     if (pProfile->bFriendlyOrDirectDefaultResponseUsedRecently)
01761                                     {
01762                                           ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_GETLOST;
01763                                     }
