01764                                     else
01765                                     {
01766                                           ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_FRIENDLY_DEFAULT1 + (UINT8) Random( 2 );
01767                                           pProfile->bFriendlyOrDirectDefaultResponseUsedRecently = TRUE;
01768                                     }
01769                                     break;
01770                               case APPROACH_DIRECT:
01771                                     if (pProfile->bFriendlyOrDirectDefaultResponseUsedRecently)
01772                                     {
01773                                           ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_GETLOST;
01774                                     }
01775                                     else
01776                                     {
01777                                           ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_DIRECT_DEFAULT;
01778                                           pProfile->bFriendlyOrDirectDefaultResponseUsedRecently = TRUE;
01779                                     }
01780                                     break;
01781                               case APPROACH_THREATEN:
01782                                     if (pProfile->bThreatenDefaultResponseUsedRecently)
01783                                     {
01784                                           ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_GETLOST;
01785                                     }
01786                                     else
01787                                     {
01788                                           ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_THREATEN_DEFAULT;
01789                                           pProfile->bThreatenDefaultResponseUsedRecently = TRUE;
01790                                     }
01791                                     break;
01792                               case APPROACH_RECRUIT:
01793                                     if (pProfile->bRecruitDefaultResponseUsedRecently)
01794                                     {
01795                                           ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_GETLOST;
01796                                     }
01797                                     else 
01798                                     {
01799                                           ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_RECRUIT_NO;
01800                                           pProfile->bRecruitDefaultResponseUsedRecently = TRUE;
01801                                     }
01802                                     break;
01803                               case APPROACH_GIVINGITEM:
01804                                     ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_GIVEITEM_NO;
01805 
01806                                     /*
01807                                     CC - now handled below 
01808                                     */
01809                                     break;
01810                               case TRIGGER_NPC:
01811                                     // trigger did not succeed - abort!!
01812                                     return;
01813                               default:
01814                                     ubQuoteNum = QUOTE_INTRO;
01815                                     break;
01816                         }
01817                         TalkingMenuDialogue( ubQuoteNum );
01818                         pProfile->ubLastQuoteSaid = ubQuoteNum;
01819                         pProfile->bLastQuoteSaidWasSpecial = FALSE;
01820                         if (ubQuoteNum == QUOTE_GETLOST)
01821                         {
01822                               if (ubNPC == 70 || ubNPC == 120)
01823                               {
01824                                     // becomes an enemy
01825                                     NPCDoAction( ubNPC, NPC_ACTION_BECOME_ENEMY, 0 );
01826                               }
01827                               // close panel at end of speech
01828                               NPCClosePanel();
01829                         }
01830                         else if ( ubQuoteNum == QUOTE_GIVEITEM_NO )
01831                         {
01832                               // close panel at end of speech
01833                               NPCClosePanel();
01834                               if ( pNPC )
01835                               {
01836                                     switch( ubNPC )
01837                                     {
01838                                           case JIM:
01839                                           case JACK:
01840                                           case OLAF:
01841                                           case RAY:
01842                                           case OLGA:
01843                                           case TYRONE:
01844                                                 // Start combat etc
01845                                                 CancelAIAction( pNPC, TRUE );
01846                                                 AddToShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuoteList( pNPC->ubID );
01847                                           default:
01848                                                 break;
01849                                     }
01850                               }
01851                         }
01852                   }
01853                   else
01854                   {
01855 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01856                         if ( gfDisplayScreenMsgOnRecordUsage )
01857                         {
01858                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, L"Using record %d for %s", ubRecordNum, gMercProfiles[ ubNPC ].zNickname );
01859                         }
01860 #endif
01861 
01862                         // turn before speech?
01863                         if ( pQuotePtr->sActionData <= -NPC_ACTION_TURN_TO_FACE_NEAREST_MERC )
01864                         {
01865                               pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubNPC, FALSE );
01866                               ZEROTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->AICounter );
01867                               if (pSoldier->bNextAction == AI_ACTION_WAIT)
01868                               {
01869                                     pSoldier->bNextAction = AI_ACTION_NONE;
01870                                     pSoldier->usNextActionData = 0;
01871                               }
01872                               NPCDoAction( ubNPC, (UINT16) -(pQuotePtr->sActionData), ubRecordNum );                          
01873                         }
01874                         if (pQuotePtr->ubQuoteNum != NO_QUOTE)
01875                         {
01876                               // say quote and following consecutive quotes
01877                               for (ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < pQuotePtr->ubNumQuotes; ubLoop++)
01878                               {
01879                                     TalkingMenuDialogue( (UINT8)( pQuotePtr->ubQuoteNum + ubLoop  ) );
01880                               }
01881                               pProfile->ubLastQuoteSaid = ubRecordNum;
01882                               pProfile->bLastQuoteSaidWasSpecial = TRUE;
01883                         }
01884                         // set to "said" if we should do so
01885                         if (pQuotePtr->fFlags & QUOTE_FLAG_ERASE_ONCE_SAID || pQuotePtr->fFlags & QUOTE_FLAG_SAY_ONCE_PER_CONVO)
01886                         {
01887                               TURN_FLAG_ON( pQuotePtr->fFlags, QUOTE_FLAG_SAID );
01888                         }
01889 
01890                         // Carry out implications (actions) of this record
01891 
01892                         // Give NPC item if appropriate
01893                         if (bApproach == APPROACH_GIVINGITEM )
01894                         {
01895                               if ( pQuotePtr->sActionData != NPC_ACTION_DONT_ACCEPT_ITEM )
01896                               {
01897                                     PlaceObjectInSoldierProfile( ubNPC, pObj );
01898 
01899                                     // Find the GIVER....
01900                                     pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubMerc, FALSE );
01901 
01902                                     // Is this one of us?
01903                                     if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
01904                                     {
01905                                           INT8 bSlot;
01906 
01907                                           bSlot = FindExactObj( pSoldier, pObj );
01908                                           if (bSlot != NO_SLOT)
01909                                           {
01910                                                 RemoveObjs( &(pSoldier->inv[bSlot]), pObj->ubNumberOfObjects );
01911                                                 DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
01912                                           }
01913                                     }
01914                                     else
01915                                     {
01916                                           RemoveObjectFromSoldierProfile( ubMerc, pObj->usItem );
01917                                     }
01918                               }
01919                               // CC: now handled below
01920                               /*
01921                               else
01922                               {
01923                                     // ATE: Here, put back into inventory or place on ground....
01924                                     {
01925                                           // Find the merc
01926                                           pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubMerc, FALSE );
01927 
01928                                           // Try to auto place object and then if it fails, put into cursor
01929                                           if ( !AutoPlaceObject( pSoldier, pObj, FALSE ) )
01930                                           {
01931                                                 InternalBeginItemPointer( pSoldier, pObj, NO_SLOT );
01932                                           }
01933                                           DirtyMercPanelInterface( pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
01934 
01935                                     }
01936                               }
01937                               */
01938                         }
01939                         else if (bApproach == APPROACH_RECRUIT)
01940                         {
01941                               // the guy just joined our party
01942                         }
01943 
01944                         // Set things
01945                         if (pQuotePtr->usSetFactTrue != NO_FACT)
01946                         {
01947                               SetFactTrue( pQuotePtr->usSetFactTrue );
01948                         }
01949                         if (pQuotePtr->ubEndQuest != NO_QUEST)
01950                         {
01951                               EndQuest( pQuotePtr->ubEndQuest, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
01952                         }
01953                         if (pQuotePtr->ubStartQuest != NO_QUEST)
01954                         {
01955                               StartQuest( pQuotePtr->ubStartQuest, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
01956                         }
01957 
01958                         // Give item to merc?
01959                         if ( pQuotePtr->usGiftItem >= TURN_UI_OFF )
01960                         {
01961                               switch ( pQuotePtr->usGiftItem )
01962                               {
01963                                     case TURN_UI_OFF:
01964                                           if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
01965                                           {
01966                                                 gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= ENGAGED_IN_CONV;
01967                                                 // Increment refrence count...
01968                                                 giNPCReferenceCount = 1;
01969                                           }
01970                                           break;
01971                                     case TURN_UI_ON:
01972                                           // while the special ref count is set, ignore standard off
01973                                           if ( giNPCSpecialReferenceCount == 0 )
01974                                           {
01975                                                 gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= ~ENGAGED_IN_CONV;
01976                                                 // Decrement refrence count...
01977                                                 giNPCReferenceCount = 0;
01978                                           }
01979                                           break;
01980                                     case SPECIAL_TURN_UI_OFF:
01981                                           if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
01982                                           {
01983 
01984                                                 gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= ENGAGED_IN_CONV;
01985                                                 // Increment refrence count...
01986                                                 giNPCReferenceCount = 1;
01987                                                 if ( giNPCSpecialReferenceCount < 0 )
01988                                                 {
01989                                                       // ???
01990                                                       giNPCSpecialReferenceCount = 0;
01991                                                 }
01992                                                 // increment SPECIAL reference count
01993                                                 giNPCSpecialReferenceCount += 1;
01994                                           }
01995                                           break;
01996                                     case SPECIAL_TURN_UI_ON:
01997                                           // Decrement SPECIAL reference count
01998                                           giNPCSpecialReferenceCount -= 1;
01999                                           // if special count is now 0, turn reactivate UI
02000                                           if ( giNPCSpecialReferenceCount == 0 )
02001                                           {
02002                                                 gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= ~ENGAGED_IN_CONV;
02003                                                 giNPCReferenceCount = 0;
02004                                           }
02005                                           else if ( giNPCSpecialReferenceCount < 0 )
02006                                           {
02007                                                 // ???
02008                                                 giNPCSpecialReferenceCount = 0;
02009                                           }
02010                                           break;
02011                               }
02012                         }
02013                         else if ( pQuotePtr->usGiftItem != 0 )
02014                         {
02015                               {
02016                                     INT8 bInvPos;
02017 
02018                                     // Get soldier
02019                                     pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubNPC, FALSE );
02020 
02021                                     // Look for item....
02022                                     bInvPos = FindObj( pSoldier, pQuotePtr->usGiftItem );
02023 
02024                                     AssertMsg( bInvPos != NO_SLOT, "NPC.C:  Gift item does not exist in NPC." );
02025 
02026                                     TalkingMenuGiveItem( ubNPC, &(pSoldier->inv[ bInvPos ] ), bInvPos );
02027                               }
02028                         }     
02029                         // Action before movement?
02030                         if ( pQuotePtr->sActionData < 0 && pQuotePtr->sActionData > -NPC_ACTION_TURN_TO_FACE_NEAREST_MERC )
02031                         {
02032                               pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubNPC, FALSE );
02033                               ZEROTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->AICounter );
02034                               if (pSoldier->bNextAction == AI_ACTION_WAIT)
02035                               {
02036                                     pSoldier->bNextAction = AI_ACTION_NONE;
02037                                     pSoldier->usNextActionData = 0;
02038                               }
02039                               NPCDoAction( ubNPC, (UINT16) -(pQuotePtr->sActionData), ubRecordNum );                          
02040                         }
02041                         else if ( pQuotePtr->usGoToGridno == NO_MOVE && pQuotePtr->sActionData > 0 )
02042                         {
02043                               pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubNPC, FALSE );
02044                               ZEROTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->AICounter );
02045                               if (pSoldier->bNextAction == AI_ACTION_WAIT)
02046                               {
02047                                     pSoldier->bNextAction = AI_ACTION_NONE;
02048                                     pSoldier->usNextActionData = 0;
02049                               }
02050                               NPCDoAction( ubNPC, (UINT16) (pQuotePtr->sActionData), ubRecordNum );                           
02051                         }
02052 
02053                         // Movement?
02054                         if ( pQuotePtr->usGoToGridno != NO_MOVE )
02055                         {
02056                               pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubNPC, FALSE );
02057 
02058                               // stupid hack CC
02059                               if (pSoldier && ubNPC == KYLE) 
02060                               {
02061                                     // make sure he has keys
02062                                     pSoldier->bHasKeys = TRUE;
02063                               }
02064                               if (pSoldier && pSoldier->sGridNo == pQuotePtr->usGoToGridno )
02065                               {
02066                                     // search for quotes to trigger immediately!
02067                                     pSoldier->ubQuoteRecord = ubRecordNum + 1; // add 1 so that the value is guaranteed nonzero
02068                                     NPCReachedDestination( pSoldier, TRUE );
02069                               }
02070                               else
02071                               {
02072                                     // turn off cowering
02073                                     if ( pNPC->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_COWERING)
02074                                     {
02075                                           //pNPC->uiStatusFlags &= ~SOLDIER_COWERING;
02076                                           EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pNPC, STANDING, 0 , FALSE );
02077                                     }
02078 
02079                                     pSoldier->ubQuoteRecord = ubRecordNum + 1; // add 1 so that the value is guaranteed nonzero
02080 
02081                                     if (pQuotePtr->sActionData == NPC_ACTION_TELEPORT_NPC)
02082                                     {
02083                                           BumpAnyExistingMerc( pQuotePtr->usGoToGridno );
02084                                           TeleportSoldier( pSoldier, pQuotePtr->usGoToGridno, FALSE );
02085                                           // search for quotes to trigger immediately!
02086                                           NPCReachedDestination( pSoldier, FALSE );
02087                                     }
02088                                     else
02089                                     {
02090                                           NPCGotoGridNo( ubNPC, pQuotePtr->usGoToGridno, ubRecordNum );
02091                                     }
02092                               }
02093                         }
02094 
02095                         // Trigger other NPC?
02096                         // ATE: Do all triggers last!
02097                         if ( pQuotePtr->ubTriggerNPC != IRRELEVANT )
02098                         {
02099                               // Check for special NPC trigger codes
02100                               if ( pQuotePtr->ubTriggerNPC == 0 )
02101                               {
02102                                     TriggerClosestMercWhoCanSeeNPC( ubNPC, pQuotePtr );
02103                               }
02104                               else if ( pQuotePtr->ubTriggerNPC == 1 )
02105                               {
02106                                     // trigger self
02107                                     TriggerNPCRecord( ubNPC, pQuotePtr->ubTriggerNPCRec );
02108                               }
02109                               else
02110                               {
02111                                     TriggerNPCRecord( pQuotePtr->ubTriggerNPC, pQuotePtr->ubTriggerNPCRec );
02112                               }
02113                         }
02114 
02115                         // Ian says it is okay to take this out! 
02116                         /*
02117                         if (bApproach == APPROACH_ENEMY_NPC_QUOTE)
02118                         {
02119                               NPCClosePanel();
02120                         }
02121                         */
02122                         
02123                   }
02124                   break;
02125       }
02126 
02127       // Set last day spoken!
02128       switch( bApproach )
02129       {
02130             case APPROACH_FRIENDLY:
02131             case APPROACH_DIRECT:
02132             case APPROACH_THREATEN:
02133             case APPROACH_RECRUIT:
02134             case NPC_INITIATING_CONV:
02135             case NPC_INITIAL_QUOTE:
02136             case APPROACH_SPECIAL_INITIAL_QUOTE:
02137             case APPROACH_DECLARATION_OF_HOSTILITY:
02138             case APPROACH_INITIAL_QUOTE:
02139             case APPROACH_GIVINGITEM:
02140                   pProfile->ubLastDateSpokenTo = (UINT8) GetWorldDay();
02141                   break;
02142             default:
02143                   break;
02144       }
02145 
02146       // return item?
02147       if ( fAttemptingToGiveItem ) 
02148       {
02149             ReturnItemToPlayerIfNecessary( ubMerc, bApproach, uiApproachData, pQuotePtr );
02150       }
02151 }
02152 
02153 INT16 NPCConsiderInitiatingConv( SOLDIERTYPE * pNPC, UINT8 * pubDesiredMerc )
02154 {
02155       INT16                               sMyGridNo, sDist, sDesiredMercDist = 100;
02156       UINT8                               ubNPC, ubMerc, ubDesiredMerc = NOBODY;
02157       UINT8                               ubTalkDesire, ubHighestTalkDesire = 0;
02158       SOLDIERTYPE *           pMerc;
02159       SOLDIERTYPE *           pDesiredMerc;
02160       NPCQuoteInfo *    pNPCQuoteInfoArray;
02161 
02162       CHECKF( pubDesiredMerc );
02163       sMyGridNo = pNPC->sGridNo;
02164 
02165       ubNPC = pNPC->ubProfile;
02166       if (EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubNPC ) == FALSE)
02167       {
02168             // error!!!
02169             return( NOWHERE );
02170       }
02171       pNPCQuoteInfoArray = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC];
02172 
02173       // loop through all mercs
02174       for ( ubMerc = 0; ubMerc < guiNumMercSlots; ubMerc++ )
02175       {
02176             pMerc = MercSlots[ ubMerc ];
02177             if (pMerc != NULL)
02178             {
02179                   // only look for mercs on the side of the player
02180                   if (pMerc->bSide != gbPlayerNum)
02181                   {
02182                         continue;
02183                   }
02184 
02185                   // only look for active mercs
02186                   if (pMerc->bAssignment >= ON_DUTY )
02187                   {
02188                         continue;
02189                   }
02190 
02191                   // if they're not visible, don't think about it
02192                   if (pNPC->bOppList[ubMerc] != SEEN_CURRENTLY)
02193                   {
02194                         continue;
02195                   } 
02196 
02197                   // what's the opinion required for the highest-opinion quote that we would
02198                   // say to this merc
02199                   ubTalkDesire = NPCConsiderTalking( pNPC->ubProfile, pMerc->ubProfile, NPC_INITIATING_CONV, 0, pNPCQuoteInfoArray, NULL, NULL );
02200                   if (ubTalkDesire > 0)
02201                   {
02202                         if (ubTalkDesire > ubHighestTalkDesire)
02203                         {
02204                               ubHighestTalkDesire = ubTalkDesire;
02205                               ubDesiredMerc = ubMerc;
02206                               pDesiredMerc = MercPtrs[ubMerc];
02207                               sDesiredMercDist = PythSpacesAway( sMyGridNo, pDesiredMerc->sGridNo );
02208                         }
02209                         else if (ubTalkDesire == ubHighestTalkDesire)
02210                         {
02211                               sDist = PythSpacesAway( sMyGridNo, MercPtrs[ubMerc]->sGridNo );
02212                               if (sDist < sDesiredMercDist)
02213                               {
02214                                     // we can say the same thing to this merc, and they're closer!
02215                                     ubDesiredMerc = ubMerc;
02216                                     sDesiredMercDist = sDist;
02217                               }
02218                         }
02219                   }
02220             }
02221       }
02222 
02223       if (ubDesiredMerc == NOBODY)
02224       {
02225             return( NOWHERE );
02226       }
02227       else
02228       {
02229             *pubDesiredMerc = ubDesiredMerc;
02230             return ( pDesiredMerc->sGridNo );
02231       }
02232 }
02233 
02234 UINT8 NPCTryToInitiateConv( SOLDIERTYPE * pNPC )
02235 { // assumes current action is ACTION_APPROACH_MERC
02236       if (pNPC->bAction != AI_ACTION_APPROACH_MERC)
02237       {
02238             return( AI_ACTION_NONE );
02239       }
02240       if (PythSpacesAway( pNPC->sGridNo, MercPtrs[pNPC->usActionData]->sGridNo ) < CONVO_DIST)
02241       {
02242             // initiate conversation!
02243             Converse( pNPC->ubProfile, MercPtrs[pNPC->usActionData]->ubProfile, NPC_INITIATING_CONV, 0 );
02244             // after talking, wait a while before moving anywhere else
02245             return( AI_ACTION_WAIT );
02246       }
02247       else
02248       {
02249             // try to move towards that merc
02250             return( AI_ACTION_APPROACH_MERC );
02251       }
02252 }
02253 
02254 
02255 /*
02256 BOOLEAN NPCOkToGiveItem( UINT8 ubNPC, UINT8 ubMerc, UINT16 usItem )
02257 {
02258       // This function seems to be unused...
02259 
02260       NPCQuoteInfo                              QuoteInfo;
02261       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pQuotePtr = &(QuoteInfo);
02262       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pNPCQuoteInfoArray;
02263       UINT8                                                 ubOpinionVal;
02264       UINT8                                                 ubQuoteNum;
02265 
02266       if (EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubNPC ) == FALSE)
02267       {
02268             // error!!!
02269             return( FALSE );
02270       }
02271       pNPCQuoteInfoArray = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC];
02272 
02273       ubOpinionVal =  NPCConsiderReceivingItemFromMerc( ubNPC, ubMerc, usItem, pNPCQuoteInfoArray, &pQuotePtr, &ubQuoteNum );
02274 
02275       if ( ubOpinionVal )
02276       {
02277             return( TRUE );
02278       }
02279       else
02280       {
02281             return( FALSE );
02282       }
02283 }
02284 */
02285 void NPCReachedDestination( SOLDIERTYPE * pNPC, BOOLEAN fAlreadyThere )
02286 {
02287       // perform action or whatever after reaching our destination
02288       UINT8       ubNPC;
02289       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pQuotePtr;
02290       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pNPCQuoteInfoArray;
02291       UINT8                                                 ubLoop;
02292       UINT8                                                 ubQuoteRecord;
02293 
02294       if ( pNPC->ubQuoteRecord == 0 )
02295       {
02296             ubQuoteRecord = 0;
02297       }
02298       else
02299       {
02300             ubQuoteRecord = (UINT8) (pNPC->ubQuoteRecord - 1);
02301       }
02302 
02303       // Clear values!
02304       pNPC->ubQuoteRecord = 0;
02305       if (pNPC->bTeam == gbPlayerNum)
02306       {
02307             // the "under ai control" flag was set temporarily; better turn it off now
02308             pNPC->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_PCUNDERAICONTROL);
02309             // make damn sure the AI_HANDLE_EVERY_FRAME flag is turned off
02310             pNPC->fAIFlags &= (AI_HANDLE_EVERY_FRAME);
02311       }
02312 
02313       ubNPC = pNPC->ubProfile;
02314       if (EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubNPC ) == FALSE)
02315       {
02316             // error!!!
02317             return;
02318       }
02319 
02320       pNPCQuoteInfoArray = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC];
02321       pQuotePtr = &(pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubQuoteRecord]);
02322       // either we are supposed to consider a new quote record
02323       // (indicated by a negative gridno in the has-item field)
02324       // or an action to perform once we reached this gridno
02325 
02326       if ( pNPC->sGridNo == pQuotePtr->usGoToGridno )
02327       {
02328             // check for an after-move action
02329             if ( pQuotePtr->sActionData > 0)
02330             {
02331                   NPCDoAction( ubNPC, (UINT16) pQuotePtr->sActionData, ubQuoteRecord );
02332             }           
02333       }
02334 
02335       for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS; ubLoop++ )
02336       {
02337             pQuotePtr = &(pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubLoop]);
02338             if ( pNPC->sGridNo == -(pQuotePtr->sRequiredGridno ) )
02339             {
02340                   if ( NPCConsiderQuote( ubNPC, 0, TRIGGER_NPC, ubLoop, 0, pNPCQuoteInfoArray ) )
02341                   {
02342                         if (fAlreadyThere)
02343                         {
02344                               TriggerNPCRecord( ubNPC, ubLoop );  
02345                         }
02346                         else
02347                         {
02348                               // trigger this quote
02349                               TriggerNPCRecordImmediately( ubNPC, ubLoop );   
02350                         }
02351                         return;
02352                   }
02353             }
02354       }
02355 }
02356 
02357 void TriggerNPCRecord( UINT8 ubTriggerNPC, UINT8 ubTriggerNPCRec )
02358 {
02359       // Check if we have a quote to trigger...
02360       NPCQuoteInfo *pQuotePtr;
02361       BOOLEAN      fDisplayDialogue = TRUE;
02362 
02363       if (EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubTriggerNPC ) == FALSE)
02364       {
02365             // error!!!
02366             return;
02367       }
02368       pQuotePtr = &(gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubTriggerNPC ][ ubTriggerNPCRec ]);
02369       if ( pQuotePtr->ubQuoteNum == IRRELEVANT )
02370       {
02371             fDisplayDialogue = FALSE;
02372       }
02373 
02374       if ( NPCConsiderQuote( ubTriggerNPC, 0, TRIGGER_NPC, ubTriggerNPCRec, 0, gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubTriggerNPC ] ) )
02375       {
02376             NPCTriggerNPC( ubTriggerNPC, ubTriggerNPCRec, TRIGGER_NPC, fDisplayDialogue );
02377       }
02378       else
02379       {
02380             // don't do anything
02381             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "WARNING: trigger of %d, record %d cannot proceed, possible error", ubTriggerNPC, ubTriggerNPCRec ) );
02382       }
02383 }
02384 
02385 void TriggerNPCRecordImmediately( UINT8 ubTriggerNPC, UINT8 ubTriggerNPCRec )
02386 {
02387       // Check if we have a quote to trigger...
02388       NPCQuoteInfo *pQuotePtr;
02389       BOOLEAN      fDisplayDialogue = TRUE;
02390       
02391       if (EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubTriggerNPC ) == FALSE)
02392       {
02393             // error!!!
02394             return;
02395       }                             
02396       pQuotePtr = &(gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubTriggerNPC ][ ubTriggerNPCRec ]);
02397       if ( pQuotePtr->ubQuoteNum == IRRELEVANT )
02398       {
02399             fDisplayDialogue = FALSE;
02400       }
02401 
02402 
02403       if ( NPCConsiderQuote( ubTriggerNPC, 0, TRIGGER_NPC, ubTriggerNPCRec, 0, gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubTriggerNPC ] ) )
02404       {
02405             // trigger IMMEDIATELY
02406             HandleNPCTriggerNPC( ubTriggerNPC, ubTriggerNPCRec, fDisplayDialogue, TRIGGER_NPC );
02407       }
02408       else
02409       {
02410             // don't do anything
02411             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "WARNING: trigger of %d, record %d cannot proceed, possible error", ubTriggerNPC, ubTriggerNPCRec ) );
02412       }
02413 }
02414 
02415 
02416 void PCsNearNPC( UINT8 ubNPC )
02417 {
02418       UINT8                                                 ubLoop;
02419       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pNPCQuoteInfoArray;
02420       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02421       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pQuotePtr;
02422 
02423 
02424       if (EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubNPC ) == FALSE)
02425       {
02426             // error!!!
02427             return;
02428       }                             
02429       pNPCQuoteInfoArray = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC];
02430 
02431       // see what this triggers...
02432       SetFactTrue( FACT_PC_NEAR );
02433 
02434       // Clear values!
02435       // Get value for NPC
02436       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubNPC, FALSE );
02437       pSoldier->ubQuoteRecord = 0;
02438 
02439       for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS; ubLoop++ )
02440       {
02441             pQuotePtr = &(pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubLoop]);
02442             if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == -(pQuotePtr->sRequiredGridno ) )
02443             {
02444                   if ( NPCConsiderQuote( ubNPC, 0, TRIGGER_NPC, ubLoop, 0, pNPCQuoteInfoArray ) )
02445                   {
02446                         // trigger this quote IMMEDIATELY!
02447                         TriggerNPCRecordImmediately( ubNPC, ubLoop );
02448                         break;
02449                   }
02450             }
02451       }
02452 
02453       // reset fact
02454       SetFactFalse( FACT_PC_NEAR );
02455 }
02456 
02457 BOOLEAN PCDoesFirstAidOnNPC( UINT8 ubNPC )
02458 {
02459       UINT8                                                 ubLoop;
02460       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pNPCQuoteInfoArray;
02461       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02462       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pQuotePtr;
02463 
02464       if (EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubNPC ) == FALSE)
02465       {
02466             // error!!!
02467             return( FALSE );
02468       }                             
02469       pNPCQuoteInfoArray = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC];
02470 
02471       // Get ptr to NPC
02472       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubNPC, FALSE );
02473       // Clear values!
02474       pSoldier->ubQuoteRecord = 0;
02475 
02476       // Set flag...
02477       gMercProfiles[ ubNPC ].ubMiscFlags2 |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG2_BANDAGED_TODAY;
02478 
02479       for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS; ubLoop++ )
02480       {
02481             pQuotePtr = &(pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubLoop]);
02482             if ( pQuotePtr->ubApproachRequired == APPROACH_GIVEFIRSTAID )
02483             {
02484                   if ( NPCConsiderQuote( ubNPC, 0, TRIGGER_NPC, ubLoop, 0, pNPCQuoteInfoArray ) )
02485                   {
02486                         // trigger this quote IMMEDIATELY!
02487                         TriggerNPCRecordImmediately( ubNPC, ubLoop );
02488                         return( TRUE );
02489                   }
02490             }
02491       }
02492       return( FALSE );
02493 }
02494 
02495 void TriggerClosestMercWhoCanSeeNPC( UINT8 ubNPC, NPCQuoteInfo *pQuotePtr )
02496 {
02497       // Loop through all mercs, gather closest mercs who can see and trigger one!
02498       UINT8 ubMercsInSector[ 40 ] = { 0 };
02499       UINT8 ubNumMercs = 0;
02500       UINT8 ubChosenMerc;
02501       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier, *pSoldier;
02502       INT32 cnt;
02503 
02504       // First get pointer to NPC 
02505       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubNPC, FALSE );
02506 
02507       // Loop through all our guys and randomly say one from someone in our sector
02508 
02509       // set up soldier ptr as first element in mercptrs list
02510       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;   
02511 
02512       // run through list
02513       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++ )
02514       {
02515             // Add guy if he's a candidate...
02516             if ( OK_INSECTOR_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && pTeamSoldier->bOppList[ pSoldier->ubID ] == SEEN_CURRENTLY )
02517             {
02518                   ubMercsInSector[ ubNumMercs ] = (UINT8)cnt;
02519                   ubNumMercs++;
02520             }
02521       }
02522 
02523       // If we are > 0
02524       if ( ubNumMercs > 0 )
02525       {
02526             ubChosenMerc = (UINT8)Random( ubNumMercs );
02527 
02528             // Post action to close panel
02529             NPCClosePanel( );
02530 
02531             // If 64, do something special
02532             if ( pQuotePtr->ubTriggerNPCRec == QUOTE_RESPONSE_TO_MIGUEL_SLASH_QUOTE_MERC_OR_RPC_LETGO )
02533             {
02534                   TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( MercPtrs[ ubMercsInSector[ ubChosenMerc ] ], pQuotePtr->ubTriggerNPCRec, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_PCTRIGGERNPC, 57, 6 );
02535             }
02536             else
02537             {
02538                   TacticalCharacterDialogue( MercPtrs[ ubMercsInSector[ ubChosenMerc ] ], pQuotePtr->ubTriggerNPCRec );
02539             }
02540       }
02541 
02542 }
02543 
02544 BOOLEAN TriggerNPCWithIHateYouQuote( UINT8 ubTriggerNPC )
02545 {
02546       // Check if we have a quote to trigger...
02547       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pNPCQuoteInfoArray;
02548       NPCQuoteInfo      *pQuotePtr;
02549       BOOLEAN                       fDisplayDialogue = TRUE;
02550       UINT8                         ubLoop;
02551 
02552       if (EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubTriggerNPC ) == FALSE)
02553       {
02554             // error!!!
02555             return( FALSE );
02556       }
02557       
02558       pNPCQuoteInfoArray = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubTriggerNPC];
02559 
02560       for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS; ubLoop++ )
02561       {
02562             pQuotePtr = &(pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubLoop]);
02563             if ( NPCConsiderQuote( ubTriggerNPC, 0, APPROACH_DECLARATION_OF_HOSTILITY, ubLoop, 0, pNPCQuoteInfoArray ) )
02564             {
02565                   // trigger this quote!
02566                   // reset approach required value so that we can trigger it
02567                   //pQuotePtr->ubApproachRequired = TRIGGER_NPC;
02568                   NPCTriggerNPC( ubTriggerNPC, ubLoop, APPROACH_DECLARATION_OF_HOSTILITY, TRUE );
02569                   gMercProfiles[ ubTriggerNPC ].ubMiscFlags |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_SAID_HOSTILE_QUOTE;
02570                   return( TRUE );
02571             }
02572       }
02573       return( FALSE );
02574 
02575 }
02576 
02577 BOOLEAN NPCHasUnusedRecordWithGivenApproach( UINT8 ubNPC, UINT8 ubApproach )
02578 {
02579       // Check if we have a quote that could be used
02580       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pNPCQuoteInfoArray;
02581       NPCQuoteInfo      *pQuotePtr;
02582       UINT8                         ubLoop;
02583 
02584       if (EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubNPC ) == FALSE)
02585       {
02586             // error!!!
02587             return( FALSE );
02588       }
02589       
02590       pNPCQuoteInfoArray = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC];
02591 
02592       for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS; ubLoop++ )
02593       {
02594             pQuotePtr = &(pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubLoop]);
02595             if ( NPCConsiderQuote( ubNPC, 0, ubApproach, ubLoop, 0, pNPCQuoteInfoArray ) )
02596             {
02597                   return( TRUE );
02598             }
02599       }
02600       return( FALSE );
02601 }
02602 
02603 BOOLEAN NPCHasUnusedHostileRecord( UINT8 ubNPC, UINT8 ubApproach )
02604 {
02605       // this is just like the standard check BUT we must skip any
02606       // records using fact 289 and print debug msg for any records which can't be marked as used
02607       // Check if we have a quote that could be used
02608       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pNPCQuoteInfoArray;
02609       NPCQuoteInfo      *pQuotePtr;
02610       UINT8                         ubLoop;
02611 
02612       if (EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubNPC ) == FALSE)
02613       {
02614             // error!!!
02615             return( FALSE );
02616       }
02617       
02618       pNPCQuoteInfoArray = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC];
02619 
02620       for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS; ubLoop++ )
02621       {
02622             pQuotePtr = &(pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubLoop]);
02623             if ( NPCConsiderQuote( ubNPC, 0, ubApproach, ubLoop, 0, pNPCQuoteInfoArray ) )
02624             {
02625                   if ( pQuotePtr->usFactMustBeTrue == FACT_NPC_HOSTILE_OR_PISSED_OFF )
02626                   {
02627                         continue;
02628                   }
02629                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02630                   if ( !(pQuotePtr->fFlags & QUOTE_FLAG_ERASE_ONCE_SAID)  )
02631                   {
02632                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, L"Warning: possible infinite quote loop to follow." );
02633                   }
02634                   #endif
02635                   return( TRUE );
02636             }
02637       }
02638       return( FALSE );
02639 }

02641 
02642 BOOLEAN NPCWillingToAcceptItem( UINT8 ubNPC, UINT8 ubMerc, OBJECTTYPE * pObj )
02643 {
02644       // Check if we have a quote that could be used, that applies to this item
02645       NPCQuoteInfo *          pNPCQuoteInfoArray;
02646       NPCQuoteInfo *          pQuotePtr;
02647       UINT8                                     ubOpinion, ubQuoteNum;
02648 
02649       if (EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubNPC ) == FALSE)
02650       {
02651             // error!!!
02652             return( FALSE );
02653       }
02654       
02655       pNPCQuoteInfoArray = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC];
02656 
02657       ubOpinion = NPCConsiderReceivingItemFromMerc( ubNPC, ubMerc, pObj, pNPCQuoteInfoArray, &pQuotePtr, &ubQuoteNum );
02658 
02659       if ( pQuotePtr )
02660       {
02661             return( TRUE );
02662       }
02663 
02664       return( FALSE );
02665 }

02668 BOOLEAN GetInfoForAbandoningEPC( UINT8 ubNPC, UINT16 * pusQuoteNum, UINT16 * pusFactToSetTrue )
02669 {
02670       // Check if we have a quote that could be used
02671       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pNPCQuoteInfoArray;
02672       NPCQuoteInfo      *pQuotePtr;
02673       UINT8                         ubLoop;
02674 
02675       if (EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubNPC ) == FALSE)
02676       {
02677             // error!!!
02678             return( FALSE );
02679       }
02680       
02681       pNPCQuoteInfoArray = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubNPC];
02682 
02683       for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS; ubLoop++ )
02684       {
02685             pQuotePtr = &(pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubLoop]);
02686             if ( NPCConsiderQuote( ubNPC, 0, APPROACH_EPC_IN_WRONG_SECTOR, ubLoop, 0, pNPCQuoteInfoArray ) )
02687             {
02688                   *pusQuoteNum = pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubLoop].ubQuoteNum;
02689                   *pusFactToSetTrue = pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubLoop].usSetFactTrue;
02690                   return( TRUE );
02691             }
02692       }
02693       return( FALSE );
02694 }
02695 
02696 BOOLEAN TriggerNPCWithGivenApproach( UINT8 ubTriggerNPC, UINT8 ubApproach, BOOLEAN fShowPanel )
02697 {
02698       // Check if we have a quote to trigger...
02699       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pNPCQuoteInfoArray;
02700       NPCQuoteInfo      *pQuotePtr;
02701       BOOLEAN                       fDisplayDialogue = TRUE;
02702       UINT8                         ubLoop;
02703 
02704       if (EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubTriggerNPC ) == FALSE)
02705       {
02706             // error!!!
02707             return( FALSE );
02708       }
02709       
02710       pNPCQuoteInfoArray = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubTriggerNPC];
02711 
02712       for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS; ubLoop++ )
02713       {
02714             pQuotePtr = &(pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ubLoop]);
02715             if ( NPCConsiderQuote( ubTriggerNPC, 0, ubApproach, ubLoop, 0, pNPCQuoteInfoArray ) )
02716             {
02717                   if ( pQuotePtr->ubQuoteNum == IRRELEVANT )
02718                   {
02719                         fShowPanel = FALSE;
02720                   }
02721                   else
02722                   {
02723                         fShowPanel = TRUE;
02724                   }
02725 
02726                   // trigger this quote!
02727                   // reset approach required value so that we can trigger it
02728                   //pQuotePtr->ubApproachRequired = TRIGGER_NPC;
02729                   NPCTriggerNPC( ubTriggerNPC, ubLoop, ubApproach, fShowPanel );
02730                   return( TRUE );
02731             }
02732       }
02733       return( FALSE );
02734 
02735 }
02736 
02737 
02738 BOOLEAN SaveNPCInfoToSaveGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
02739 {
02740       UINT32            uiNumBytesWritten=0;
02741       UINT32            cnt;
02742       UINT8             ubOne = 1;
02743       UINT8             ubZero = 0;
02744 
02745 
02746       //Loop through all the NPC quotes
02747       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_PROFILES; cnt++)
02748       {
02749             //if there is a npc qutoe 
02750             if( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] )
02751             {
02752                   //save a byte specify that there is an npc quote saved
02753                   FileWrite( hFile, &ubOne, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
02754                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT8 ) )
02755                   {
02756                         return( FALSE );
02757                   }
02758 
02759                   //Save the NPC quote entry
02760                   FileWrite( hFile, gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ], sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo ) * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS, &uiNumBytesWritten );
02761                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo )  * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS )
02762                   {
02763                         return( FALSE );
02764                   }
02765             }
02766             else
02767             {
02768                   //save a byte specify that there is an npc quote saved
02769                   FileWrite( hFile, &ubZero, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
02770                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT8 ) )
02771                   {
02772                         return( FALSE );
02773                   }
02774             }
02775       }
02776 
02777       for( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_CIVQUOTE_SECTORS; cnt++)
02778       {
02779             //if there is a civ quote 
02780             if( gpCivQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] )
02781             {
02782                   //save a byte specify that there is an npc quote saved
02783                   FileWrite( hFile, &ubOne, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
02784                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT8 ) )
02785                   {
02786                         return( FALSE );
02787                   }
02788 
02789                   //Save the NPC quote entry
02790                   FileWrite( hFile, gpCivQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ], sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo ) * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS, &uiNumBytesWritten );
02791                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo )  * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS )
02792                   {
02793                         return( FALSE );
02794                   }
02795             }
02796             else
02797             {
02798                   //save a byte specify that there is an npc quote saved
02799                   FileWrite( hFile, &ubZero, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
02800                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT8 ) )
02801                   {
02802                         return( FALSE );
02803                   }
02804             }
02805       }
02806 
02807 
02808       return( TRUE );
02809 }
02810 
02811 BOOLEAN LoadNPCInfoFromSavedGameFile( HWFILE hFile, UINT32 uiSaveGameVersion )
02812 {
02813       UINT32            uiNumBytesRead=0;
02814       UINT32            cnt;
02815       UINT8             ubLoadQuote=0;
02816       UINT32            uiNumberToLoad=0;
02817 
02818 
02819       // If we are trying to restore a saved game prior to version 44, use the
02820       // MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS, else use NUM_PROFILES.  Dave used the wrong define! 
02821       if( uiSaveGameVersion >= 44 )
02822             uiNumberToLoad = NUM_PROFILES;
02823       else
02824             uiNumberToLoad = MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS;
02825 
02826       //Loop through all the NPC quotes
02827       for( cnt=0; cnt<uiNumberToLoad; cnt++ )
02828       {
02829             //Load a byte specify that there is an npc quote Loadd
02830             FileRead( hFile, &ubLoadQuote, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02831             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT8 ) )
02832             {
02833                   return( FALSE );
02834             }
02835 
02836             //if there is an existing quote
02837             if( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] )
02838             {
02839                   //delete it
02840                   MemFree( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] );
02841                   gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] = NULL;
02842             }
02843 
02844             //if there is a npc quote 
02845             if( ubLoadQuote )
02846             {
02847                   //if there is no memory allocated
02848                   if( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] == NULL )
02849                   {
02850                         //allocate memory for the quote
02851                         gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] = (NPCQuoteInfo *)MemAlloc( sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo )  * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS );
02852                         if( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] == NULL )
02853                               return( FALSE );
02854                         memset( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ], 0, sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo )  * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS );
02855                   }
02856 
02857                   //Load the NPC quote entry
02858                   FileRead( hFile, gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ], sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo )  * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS, &uiNumBytesRead );
02859                   if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo )  * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS )
02860                   {
02861                         return( FALSE );
02862                   }
02863             }
02864             else
02865             {
02866             }
02867       }
02868 
02869       if ( uiSaveGameVersion >= 56 )
02870       {
02871             for( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_CIVQUOTE_SECTORS; cnt++)
02872             {
02873                   FileRead( hFile, &ubLoadQuote, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02874                   if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT8 ) )
02875                   {
02876                         return( FALSE );
02877                   }
02878 
02879                   //if there is an existing quote
02880                   if( gpCivQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] )
02881                   {
02882                         //delete it
02883                         MemFree( gpCivQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] );
02884                         gpCivQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] = NULL;
02885                   }
02886 
02887                   // if there is a civ quote file
02888                   if( ubLoadQuote )
02889                   {
02890                         //if there is no memory allocated
02891                         if( gpCivQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] == NULL )
02892                         {
02893                               //allocate memory for the quote
02894                               gpCivQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] = (NPCQuoteInfo *)MemAlloc( sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo )  * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS );
02895                               if( gpCivQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] == NULL )
02896                                     return( FALSE );
02897                               memset( gpCivQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ], 0, sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo )  * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS );
02898                         }
02899 
02900                         //Load the civ quote entry
02901                         FileRead( hFile, gpCivQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ], sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo )  * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS, &uiNumBytesRead );
02902                         if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo )  * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS )
02903                         {
02904                               return( FALSE );
02905                         }
02906                   }
02907             }
02908       }
02909 
02910       if ( uiSaveGameVersion < 88 )
02911       {
02912             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( NO_PROFILE, 5 ); // special pass-in value for "replace PC scripts"
02913             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( DARYL, 11 );
02914             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( DARYL, 14 );
02915             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( DARYL, 15 );
02916       }
02917       if ( uiSaveGameVersion < 89 )
02918       {
02919             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( KINGPIN, 23 );
02920             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( KINGPIN, 27 );
02921       }
02922       if ( uiSaveGameVersion < 90 )
02923       {
02924             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( KINGPIN, 25 );
02925             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( KINGPIN, 26 );
02926       }
02927       if ( uiSaveGameVersion < 92 )
02928       {
02929             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( MATT, 14 );
02930             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( AUNTIE, 8 );
02931       }
02932       if ( uiSaveGameVersion < 93 )
02933       {
02934             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( JENNY, 7 );
02935             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( JENNY, 8 );
02936             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( FRANK, 7 );
02937             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( FRANK, 8 );
02938             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( FATHER, 12 );
02939             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( FATHER, 13 );
02940       }
02941       if ( uiSaveGameVersion < 94 )
02942       {
02943             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( CONRAD, 0 );
02944             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( CONRAD, 2 );
02945             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( CONRAD, 9 );
02946       }
02947       if ( uiSaveGameVersion < 95 )
02948       {
02949             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( WALDO, 6 );
02950             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( WALDO, 7 );
02951             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( WALDO, 10 );
02952             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( WALDO, 11 );
02953             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( WALDO, 12 );
02954       }
02955       if ( uiSaveGameVersion < 96 )
02956       {
02957             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( HANS, 18 );
02958             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( ARMAND, 13 );
02959             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( DARREN, 4 );
02960             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( DARREN, 5 );
02961       }
02962       if ( uiSaveGameVersion < 97 )
02963       {
02964             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( JOHN, 22 );
02965             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( JOHN, 23 );
02966             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( SKYRIDER, 19 );
02967             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( SKYRIDER, 21 );
02968             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( SKYRIDER, 22 );
02969       }
02970 
02971       if ( uiSaveGameVersion < 98 )
02972       {
02973             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( SKYRIDER, 19 );
02974             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( SKYRIDER, 21 );
02975             RefreshNPCScriptRecord( SKYRIDER, 22 );
02976       }
02977 
02978       return( TRUE );
02979 }
02980 
02981 BOOLEAN SaveBackupNPCInfoToSaveGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
02982 {
02983       UINT32            uiNumBytesWritten=0;
02984       UINT32            cnt;
02985       UINT8             ubOne = 1;
02986       UINT8             ubZero = 0;
02987 
02988 
02989       //Loop through all the NPC quotes
02990       for( cnt=0; cnt<NUM_PROFILES; cnt++)
02991       {
02992             //if there is a npc qutoe 
02993             if( gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] )
02994             {
02995                   //save a byte specify that there is an npc quote saved
02996                   FileWrite( hFile, &ubOne, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
02997                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT8 ) )
02998                   {
02999                         return( FALSE );
03000                   }
03001 
03002                   //Save the NPC quote entry
03003                   FileWrite( hFile, gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ], sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo ) * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS, &uiNumBytesWritten );
03004                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo )  * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS )
03005                   {
03006                         return( FALSE );
03007                   }
03008             }
03009             else
03010             {
03011                   //save a byte specify that there is an npc quote saved
03012                   FileWrite( hFile, &ubZero, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03013                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT8 ) )
03014                   {
03015                         return( FALSE );
03016                   }
03017             }
03018       }
03019 
03020       return( TRUE );
03021 }
03022 
03023 BOOLEAN LoadBackupNPCInfoFromSavedGameFile( HWFILE hFile, UINT32 uiSaveGameVersion )
03024 {
03025       UINT32            uiNumBytesRead=0;
03026       UINT32            cnt;
03027       UINT8             ubLoadQuote=0;
03028       UINT32            uiNumberOfProfilesToLoad=0;
03029 
03030       uiNumberOfProfilesToLoad = NUM_PROFILES;
03031 
03032       //Loop through all the NPC quotes
03033       for( cnt=0; cnt<uiNumberOfProfilesToLoad; cnt++ )
03034       {
03035             //Load a byte specify that there is an npc quote Loadd
03036             FileRead( hFile, &ubLoadQuote, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
03037             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT8 ) )
03038             {
03039                   return( FALSE );
03040             }
03041 
03042             //if there is an existing quote
03043             if( gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] )
03044             {
03045                   //delete it
03046                   MemFree( gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] );
03047                   gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] = NULL;
03048             }
03049 
03050             //if there is a npc quote 
03051             if( ubLoadQuote )
03052             {
03053                   //if there is no memory allocated
03054                   if( gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] == NULL )
03055                   {
03056                         //allocate memory for the quote
03057                         gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] = (NPCQuoteInfo *)MemAlloc( sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo )  * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS );
03058                         if( gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ] == NULL )
03059                               return( FALSE );
03060                         memset( gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ], 0, sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo )  * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS );
03061                   }
03062 
03063                   //Load the NPC quote entry
03064                   FileRead( hFile, gpBackupNPCQuoteInfoArray[ cnt ], sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo )  * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS, &uiNumBytesRead );
03065                   if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( NPCQuoteInfo )  * NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS )
03066                   {
03067                         return( FALSE );
03068                   }
03069             }
03070             else
03071             {
03072             }
03073       }
03074 
03075       return( TRUE );
03076 }
03077 
03078 
03079 void TriggerFriendWithHostileQuote( UINT8 ubNPC )
03080 {
03081       UINT8                               ubMercsAvailable[ 40 ] = { 0 };
03082       UINT8                               ubNumMercsAvailable = 0, ubChosenMerc;
03083       SOLDIERTYPE *           pTeamSoldier;
03084       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
03085       INT32                               cnt;
03086       INT8                                bTeam;
03087 
03088       // First get pointer to NPC 
03089       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( ubNPC, FALSE );
03090       if (!pSoldier)
03091       {
03092             return;
03093       }
03094       bTeam = pSoldier->bTeam;
03095 
03096       // Loop through all our guys and find one to yell
03097 
03098       // set up soldier ptr as first element in mercptrs list
03099       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ bTeam ].bFirstID;   
03100 
03101       // run through list
03102       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++ )
03103       {
03104             // Add guy if he's a candidate...
03105             if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pTeamSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pTeamSoldier->bBreath >= OKBREATH && pTeamSoldier->bOppCnt > 0 && pTeamSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
03106             {
03107                   if ( bTeam == CIV_TEAM && pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup != NON_CIV_GROUP && pTeamSoldier->ubCivilianGroup != pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup )
03108                   {
03109                         continue;
03110                   }
03111                   
03112                   if ( ! ( gMercProfiles[ pTeamSoldier->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_SAID_HOSTILE_QUOTE ) )
03113                   {
03114                         ubMercsAvailable[ ubNumMercsAvailable ] = pTeamSoldier->ubProfile;
03115                         ubNumMercsAvailable++;
03116                   }
03117 
03118             }
03119       }
03120 
03121       if ( bTeam == CIV_TEAM && pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup != NON_CIV_GROUP && gTacticalStatus.fCivGroupHostile[ pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup ] == CIV_GROUP_NEUTRAL )
03122       {
03123             CivilianGroupMemberChangesSides( pSoldier );
03124       }
03125       
03126       if (ubNumMercsAvailable > 0)
03127       {
03128             PauseAITemporarily();
03129             ubChosenMerc = (UINT8) Random( ubNumMercsAvailable );
03130             TriggerNPCWithIHateYouQuote( ubMercsAvailable[ ubChosenMerc ] );
03131       }
03132       else
03133       {
03134             // done... we should enter combat mode with this soldier's team starting,
03135             // after all the dialogue is completed
03136             NPCDoAction( ubNPC, NPC_ACTION_ENTER_COMBAT, 0 );
03137       }
03138 }
03139 
03140 UINT8 ActionIDForMovementRecord( UINT8 ubNPC, UINT8 ubRecord )
03141 {
03142       // Check if we have a quote to trigger...
03143       NPCQuoteInfo *                      pNPCQuoteInfoArray;
03144       NPCQuoteInfo      *pQuotePtr;
03145       BOOLEAN                       fDisplayDialogue = TRUE;
03146 
03147       if ( EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubNPC ) == FALSE )
03148       {
03149             // error!!!
03150             return( FALSE );
03151       }
03152       
03153       pNPCQuoteInfoArray = gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNPC ];
03154 
03155       pQuotePtr = &( pNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubRecord ] );
03156 
03157       switch( pQuotePtr->sActionData )
03158       {
03159             case NPC_ACTION_TRAVERSE_MAP_EAST:
03160                   return( QUOTE_ACTION_ID_TRAVERSE_EAST );
03161 
03162             case NPC_ACTION_TRAVERSE_MAP_SOUTH:
03163                   return( QUOTE_ACTION_ID_TRAVERSE_SOUTH );
03164 
03165             case NPC_ACTION_TRAVERSE_MAP_WEST:
03166                   return( QUOTE_ACTION_ID_TRAVERSE_WEST );
03167 
03168             case NPC_ACTION_TRAVERSE_MAP_NORTH:
03169                   return( QUOTE_ACTION_ID_TRAVERSE_NORTH );
03170 
03171             default:
03172                   return( QUOTE_ACTION_ID_CHECKFORDEST );
03173 
03174       }
03175 }
03176 
03177 void HandleNPCChangesForTacticalTraversal( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
03178 {
03179       if ( !pSoldier || pSoldier->ubProfile == NO_PROFILE || (pSoldier->fAIFlags & AI_CHECK_SCHEDULE) )
03180       {
03181             return;
03182       }
03183 
03184       switch( pSoldier->ubQuoteActionID )
03185       {
03186             case QUOTE_ACTION_ID_TRAVERSE_EAST:
03187                   gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].sSectorX++;
03188 
03189                   // Call to change the NPC's Sector Location
03190                   ChangeNpcToDifferentSector( pSoldier->ubProfile, 
03191                                           gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].sSectorX,
03192                                           gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].sSectorY,
03193                                           gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].bSectorZ );
03194                   break;
03195             case QUOTE_ACTION_ID_TRAVERSE_SOUTH:
03196                   gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].sSectorY++;
03197 
03198                   // Call to change the NPC's Sector Location
03199                   ChangeNpcToDifferentSector( pSoldier->ubProfile, 
03200                                           gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].sSectorX,
03201                                           gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].sSectorY,
03202                                           gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].bSectorZ );
03203                   break;
03204             case QUOTE_ACTION_ID_TRAVERSE_WEST:
03205                   gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].sSectorX--;
03206 
03207                   // Call to change the NPC's Sector Location
03208                   ChangeNpcToDifferentSector( pSoldier->ubProfile, 
03209                                           gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].sSectorX,
03210                                           gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].sSectorY,
03211                                           gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].bSectorZ );
03212                   break;
03213             case QUOTE_ACTION_ID_TRAVERSE_NORTH:
03214                   gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].sSectorY--;
03215 
03216                   // Call to change the NPC's Sector Location
03217                   ChangeNpcToDifferentSector( pSoldier->ubProfile, 
03218                                           gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].sSectorX,
03219                                           gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].sSectorY,
03220                                           gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].bSectorZ );
03221                   break;
03222             default:
03223                   break;
03224       }
03225 }

03227 
03228 void HandleVictoryInNPCSector( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT16 sSectorZ )
03229 {
03230       // handle special cases of victory in certain sector
03231       INT16 sSector = 0;
03232 
03233       // not the surface?..leave
03234       if( sSectorZ != 0 )
03235       {
03236             return;
03237       }
03238 
03239       // grab sector value
03240       sSector = SECTOR( sSectorX, sSectorY );
03241 
03242       switch( sSector )
03243       {
03244             case( SEC_F10 ):
03245             {
03246                   // we won over the hillbillies
03247                   // set fact they are dead
03248                   if( CheckFact( FACT_HILLBILLIES_KILLED, KEITH ) == FALSE )
03249                   {
03250                         SetFactTrue( FACT_HILLBILLIES_KILLED );
03251                   }
03252 
03253                   // check if keith is out of business
03254                   if( CheckFact( FACT_KEITH_OUT_OF_BUSINESS, KEITH ) == TRUE )
03255                   {
03256                         SetFactFalse( FACT_KEITH_OUT_OF_BUSINESS );
03257                   }
03258             }
03259       }
03260 
03261       return;
03262 }
03263 
03264 BOOLEAN HandleShopKeepHasBeenShutDown( UINT8 ubCharNum )
03265 {
03266       // check if shopkeep has been shutdown, if so handle
03267       switch( ubCharNum )
03268       {
03269             case( KEITH ):
03270             {
03271                   // if keith out of business, do action and leave
03272                   if( CheckFact( FACT_KEITH_OUT_OF_BUSINESS, KEITH ) == TRUE )
03273                   {
03274                         TriggerNPCRecord( KEITH, 11 );
03275 
03276                         return( TRUE );
03277                   }
03278                   else if( CheckFact( FACT_LOYALTY_LOW, KEITH ) == TRUE )
03279                   {
03280                         // loyalty is too low
03281                         TriggerNPCRecord( KEITH, 7 );
03282 
03283                         return( TRUE );
03284                   }
03285             }
03286       }
03287 
03288       return( FALSE );
03289 }

03299       else
03300       {

03302             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, L"Turning record reporting ON" );
03303       }

03307 void UpdateDarrelScriptToGoTo( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
03308 {
03309       // change destination in Darrel record 10 to go to a gridno adjacent to the 
03310       // soldier's gridno, and destination in record 11
03311       INT16 sAdjustedGridNo;
03312       UINT8 ubDummyDirection;
03313       SOLDIERTYPE *           pDarrel;
03314 
03315       pDarrel = FindSoldierByProfileID( DARREL, FALSE );
03316       if ( !pDarrel )
03317       {
03318             return;
03319       }
03320 
03321       // find a spot to an alternate location nearby
03322       sAdjustedGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotExcludingSweetSpot( pDarrel, pSoldier->sGridNo, 5, &ubDummyDirection );
03323       if (sAdjustedGridNo == NOWHERE)
03324       {
03325             // yikes! try again with a bigger radius!
03326             sAdjustedGridNo = FindGridNoFromSweetSpotExcludingSweetSpot( pDarrel, pSoldier->sGridNo, 10, &ubDummyDirection );
03327             if (sAdjustedGridNo == NOWHERE)
03328             {
03329                   // ok, now we're completely foobar
03330                   return;
03331             }
03332       }
03333       
03334       EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( DARREL );
03335       gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ DARREL ][ 10 ].usGoToGridno = sAdjustedGridNo;
03336       gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ DARREL ][ 11 ].sRequiredGridno = -(sAdjustedGridNo);
03337       gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ DARREL ][ 11 ].ubTriggerNPC = pSoldier->ubProfile;
03338 }

03340 BOOLEAN RecordHasDialogue( UINT8 ubNPC, UINT8 ubRecord )
03341 {
03342       if (EnsureQuoteFileLoaded( ubNPC ) == FALSE)
03343       {
03344             // error!!!
03345             return( FALSE );
03346       }
03347 
03348       if ( gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNPC ][ ubRecord ].ubQuoteNum != NO_QUOTE && gpNPCQuoteInfoArray[ ubNPC ][ ubRecord ].ubQuoteNum != 0 )
03349       {
03350             return( TRUE );
03351       }
03352       else
03353       {
03354             return( FALSE );
03355       }
03356 }
03357 
03358 INT8 FindCivQuoteFileIndex( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT16 sSectorZ )
03359 {
03360       UINT8             ubLoop;
03361 
03362   if ( sSectorZ > 0 )
03363   {
03364     return( MINERS_CIV_QUOTE_INDEX );
03365   }
03366   else
03367   {
03368         for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < NUM_CIVQUOTE_SECTORS; ubLoop++ )
03369         {
03370               if ( gsCivQuoteSector[ ubLoop ][ 0 ] == sSectorX && gsCivQuoteSector[ ubLoop ][ 1 ] == sSectorY )
03371               {
03372                     return( ubLoop );
03373               }
03374         }
03375   }
03376       return( -1 );
03377 }
03378 
03379 INT8 ConsiderCivilianQuotes( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT16 sSectorZ, BOOLEAN fSetAsUsed )
03380 {
03381       INT8                                      bLoop, bCivQuoteSectorIndex;
03382       NPCQuoteInfo *          pCivQuoteInfoArray;
03383 
03384       bCivQuoteSectorIndex = FindCivQuoteFileIndex( sSectorX, sSectorY, sSectorZ );
03385       if ( bCivQuoteSectorIndex == -1 )
03386       {
03387             // no hints for this sector!
03388             return( -1 );
03389       }
03390 
03391       if ( EnsureCivQuoteFileLoaded( bCivQuoteSectorIndex ) == FALSE )
03392       {
03393             // error!!!
03394             return( -1 );
03395       }
03396       
03397       pCivQuoteInfoArray = gpCivQuoteInfoArray[ bCivQuoteSectorIndex ];
03398 
03399       for ( bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_NPC_QUOTE_RECORDS; bLoop++ )
03400       {
03401             if ( NPCConsiderQuote( NO_PROFILE, NO_PROFILE, 0, bLoop, 0, pCivQuoteInfoArray ) )
03402             {
03403                   if ( fSetAsUsed )
03404                   {
03405                         TURN_FLAG_ON( pCivQuoteInfoArray[ bLoop ].fFlags, QUOTE_FLAG_SAID );
03406                   }
03407 
03408                   if (pCivQuoteInfoArray[ bLoop ].ubStartQuest != NO_QUEST)
03409                   {
03410                         StartQuest( pCivQuoteInfoArray[ bLoop ].ubStartQuest, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
03411                   }
03412 
03413                   // return quote #
03414                   return( pCivQuoteInfoArray[ bLoop ].ubQuoteNum );
03415             }
03416       }
03417 
03418       return( -1 );
03419 }
